CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_No_Students_Tutoring_AI`
AS 	
		SELECT if(o.completed_at is null,o.created_at,o.completed_at) as completed_at,
					o.invoice_code,
					(select ori.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori where ori.order_id = o.id) as email,
					(select ori.phone_number from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori where ori.order_id = o.id) as phone_number,
		from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` o
		where o.status = 3

		UNION ALL

		SELECT if(bo.accounting_date is null, bo.created_at, bo.accounting_date) as completed_at,
					bo.invoice_code,
					bo.email,
					bo.phone_number,
		from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo
		where bo.approved_status = 1;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_Order_Tutoring_No_Students`
AS SELECT bo.Date, bo.Order_Code,
       if(bo.student_code_1 is null or bo.student_code_1 = '',bo.phone_number,bo.student_code_1) as student_code,
       bo.Payment_Content,
       bo.Source,
       bo.Original_Price,
       bo.Ex,
       bo.Market,
       bo.affiliate_id,
       bo.lead_id,
      (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  where bo.affiliate_id = au.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as loai_affiliate,
      bo.user_type_id,
       bo.student_code_1,
       bo.phone_number,
       -- start adding 11/02/2025
       bo.email,
       bo.accounting_date,
       -- end adding 11/02/2025
       bo.name,
       bo.total_lesson,
       bo.total_gift_lesson,
       bo.program_id,
      (bo.total_video_course * bo.Ex) as total_video_vnd
FROM
      (select order_kt.Date,
              order_kt.Order_Code,
              if(order_ds.student_code is null or order_ds.student_code = '' ,order_ds.phone_number,order_ds.student_code) as student_code,
              order_kt.Payment_Content,
              order_kt.Source,
              order_kt.Original_Price,
              order_kt.Ex, order_kt.Market,
              order_ds.affiliate_id,
              order_ds.lead_id,
              order_ds.user_type_id,
              order_ds.student_code as student_code_1,
              order_ds.phone_number,
              -- start adding 11/02/2025
              order_ds.email,
              if(order_ds.accounting_date is null, order_ds.payment_at,order_ds.accounting_date) as accounting_date,
              -- end adding 11/02/2025
              order_ds.name,
              order_ds.total_lesson,
              order_ds.total_gift_lesson, order_ds.program_id,
              if(order_ds.total_video_course is null, 0, order_ds.total_video_course) as total_video_course,
      from kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Order_Tutoring as order_kt
      join kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order as order_ds
      on order_kt.Order_Code = order_ds.invoice_code) bo;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_order_video`
AS WITH
order_ai_tutor_single AS
(SELECT 
        (select min(order_action.created_at) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_action` order_action 
  where order_action.order_id = ord.id and not order_action.order_status = 1 ) as ngay_sale_len_don,
        ord.id,
        ord.completed_at,
        ord.created_by,
        ord.telesale_id,
        ord.register_source,        
        ord.country_id,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(ord.country_id) as country,
        ord.currency_exchange_rate,
      --   ord.total as total_oc,
        ord.sub_total,
       ordd.unit_price,
        ori.name as student_name,
        ori.phone_number as student_phone,
        ori.email as student_email,
        ord.invoice_code,
        case
            when ord.`status` = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
            when ord.`status` = 2 then 'Xác nhận'
            when ord.`status` = 3 then 'Hoàn thành'
            when ord.`status` = 4 then 'Hủy'
            else 'Khác'
	      end as status,
        ord.payment_method_id,
        ord.payment_method_status as payment_status_id,
        
        case when ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%' then ori.lead_id
             when ord.invoice_code like 'GRAI%' then bo.lead_id 
            --  (select bo.affiliate_id from `kynaforkids.booking_order` bo where RIGHT(bo.invoice_code,8) = RIGHT(ord.invoice_code,8))
        end as lead_id,
        
        case when ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%' then ord.affiliate_id
             when ord.invoice_code like 'GRAI%' then bo.affiliate_id
        end as affiliate_id,
      --   ord.utm_campaign,
        ordd.package_id,
        ordd.package_subscription_id,
        pk.name as Mon_hoc,
        (select pm.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_method` pm where pm.id = ord.payment_method_id) as payment_method,
        case
      when ord.payment_method_status = 1 then 'Chờ thanh toán'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 2 then 'Đã thanh toán'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 3 then 'Thanh toán thất bại'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 4 then 'Chờ giao hàng'
 	when ord.payment_method_status = 5 then 'Đang giao hàng'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 6 then 'Đã giao hàng'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 7 then 'Đang trả hàng'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 8 then 'Đã trả hàng'
      else null
	end as payment_status,
      -- (select pg.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_gateway` pg where pg.id = ord.shipping_method_id) as shipping_company,
--     (select max(pt.transaction_code) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_transaction` pt where pt.order_id = ord.id) as partner_code,
     if(ord.discount_amount is null,0,ord.discount_amount) as discount_amount,
    if(ordd.voucher_discount_amount is null,0,ordd.voucher_discount_amount) as voucher_discount_amount,
    if(ord.shipping_fee is null,0,ord.shipping_fee) as shipping_fee,
    (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = ord.created_by) as SIC,
    (select max(p.name) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = ord.created_by) as SIC_name,
    case
    when ordd.package_combo_id is not null then
    (select pcsi.package_subscription_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` pcsi where pcsi.id = ordd.package_subscription_id and pcsi.package_id = ordd.package_id)
    else ordd.package_subscription_id
    end as package_subscription

        
       
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` ord
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd ON (ord.id = ordd.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori ON (ord.id = ori.order_id)
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks ON (ordd.package_subscription_id = pks.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = ordd.package_id)
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.booking_lead` bll on bll.id = ori.lead_id
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.booking_order` bo on RIGHT(bo.invoice_code,8) = RIGHT(ord.invoice_code,8)




WHERE 
      ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%' or ord.invoice_code like 'GRAI%'
--       AND pk.name like '%AI Tutor%'
--       AND ordd.package_combo_id is null
),

temp_table as (
SELECT oats.*,
       (SELECT us.email FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user us WHERE oats.affiliate_id = us.id) as affiliate_email,
       (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user au WHERE au.user_id = oats.affiliate_id) as affiliate_category_id,
        
       if(oats.completed_at is null, oats.ngay_sale_len_don, oats.completed_at) as created_at,
       t2.first_time_purchase_phone,
       t3.first_time_purchase_email,
       ps.subscription_month,
       ps.name as subscription_name,
       CASE WHEN(oats.sub_total != 0) then (oats.unit_price + (oats.unit_price/oats.sub_total) * (oats.shipping_fee - (oats.discount_amount + oats.voucher_discount_amount)))
            WHEN (oats.sub_total=0) then 0
            END as total_oc,
       
FROM order_ai_tutor_single oats
      LEFT JOIN

      (select ans1.phone_number,
      min(ans1.completed_at) as first_time_purchase_phone
      from kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_No_Students_Tutoring_AI as ans1
      group by ans1.phone_number order by ans1.phone_number) t2

      on oats.student_phone = t2.phone_number

      LEFT JOIN
      
      (select ans2.email,
      min(ans2.completed_at) as first_time_purchase_email
      from kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_No_Students_Tutoring_AI as ans2
      group by ans2.email order by ans2.email) t3

      on oats.student_email = t3.email

      LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` ps ON (oats.package_subscription = ps.id)
)

select tt.* EXCEPT(affiliate_email),
      if(bll.actual_lead_id is null, bll.utm_campaign,
        (select bl.utm_campaign from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl where bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) as utm_campaign,
      if(bll.actual_lead_id is null, bll.landing_page_name,
        (select bl.landing_page_name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl where bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) as landingpage_name,
      -- if(bll.actual_lead_id is null, bll.affiliate_id,
      --   (select bl.affiliate_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl where bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) as affiliate_id,
      case when tt.invoice_code like "KYNA%" then tt.affiliate_email
           else --if(bll.actual_lead_id is null, (select max(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where bll.affiliate_id = u.id),
      --     (select max(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where bll.actual_lead_id = bl.id and bl.affiliate_id = u.id))               
                  (select max(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id =  tt.affiliate_id and au.user_id = u.id)
  
      end as affiliate_email,
     
      -- case when tt.invoice_code like "KYNA%" then (SELECT ac.name FROM `kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac WHERE ac.id = tt.affiliate_category_id)
      --      else if (bll.actual_lead_id is null, (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac where 
      --     bll.affiliate_id = au.user_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id),(select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl, 
      --     `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac 
      --     where bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id and bl.affiliate_id = au.user_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id)) 
      -- end as affiliate_category_name,

      case when tt.invoice_code like "KYNA%" then (SELECT ac.name FROM `kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac WHERE ac.id = tt.affiliate_category_id)
           else  (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  where 
      tt.affiliate_id = au.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id)
      end as affiliate_category_name,


from temp_table tt
left join `kynaforkids.booking_lead` bll on tt.lead_id = bll.id
-- left join `kynaforkids.booking_order` bo on bo.lead_id = tt.lead_id

;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_order_video_view`
AS SELECT * except(ngay_sale_len_don,completed_at,created_at,first_time_purchase_phone,first_time_purchase_email),
      timestamp_seconds(ngay_sale_len_don) as ngay_sale_len_don,
      timestamp_seconds(completed_at) as completed_at,
      timestamp_seconds(first_time_purchase_phone) as first_time_purchase_phone,
      timestamp_seconds(first_time_purchase_email) as first_time_purchase_email,
      timestamp_seconds(created_at) as created_at,
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_order_video`;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_teacher_income_ex`
(
  date DATE,
  sellingEx FLOAT64,
  teacherCountry STRING,
  currency STRING
);

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.CEO_CAC_fixedSaleSalary`
OPTIONS(
  sheet_range="fixedSaleSalary!A:G",
  skip_leading_rows=1,
  format="GOOGLE_SHEETS",
  uris=["https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uPAxX1jOKkYFZhKrAhqNwEIhO7Qc11K484YjjzJahx8/edit?usp=sharing"]
);

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.CEO_CAC_fixedSaleSalary_month`
AS WITH table_1 as
(
    SELECT 

    FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', fss.date) AS year_month,
    (fss.salaryCost - fss.saleBonus - if(fss.yearBonus is null,0,fss.yearBonus)) as fixedSaleSalary,
    -- (fss.salaryCost - fss.saleBonus) as fixedSaleSalary,
    
    fss.employeeCode

    FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.accounting_kynaforkids.CEO_CAC_fixedSaleSalary` fss
)
,
table_2 as
(
SELECT
        t1.year_month,
        sum(t1.fixedSaleSalary) as fixedSaleSalary,
        COUNT(DISTINCT t1.employeeCode) as numberEmployee
FROM table_1 t1
Where t1.year_month is not null
GROUP BY t1.year_month
ORDER BY t1.year_month desc
)

SELECT *, (t2.fixedSaleSalary/t2.numberEmployee) as avgFixdSalary
FROM table_2 t2;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Order_Tutoring`
(
  Date STRING,
  Order_Code STRING,
  Payment_Content STRING,
  Source STRING,
  Original_Price FLOAT64,
  Ex FLOAT64,
  Market STRING,
  Code_Contract STRING
);

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Test_student_teacher`
AS 
SELECT 
max(bo.student_code) as MaHV, 
max(bo.email) as Email, 
max(bo.phone_number) as Phone, 
max(p.name) as GiaoVien,
CASE
    WHEN max (bo.international_country_id) = 1 THEN 'Thailand'
    WHEN max (bo.international_country_id) = 2 THEN 'Indo'
    WHEN max (bo.international_country_id) = 3 THEN 'VietNam'
    WHEN max (bo.international_country_id) = 4 THEN 'Khac'
END as QuocGia,
max(bo.international_country_id) as international_country_id,
max (sessionStudent.teacher_id) as TeacherID,
countif(sessionStudent.rating = 2) as total_dat,
countif(sessionStudent.rating = 1)  as total_khongdat,
countif(sessionStudent.rating = 3) as total_duoichuan,
countif(sessionStudent.rating = 4) as total_nopay,
countif(sessionStudent.rating = 4 and sessionStudent.program_id = 8) as total_nopay_1_ca,
countif(sessionStudent.rating = 4 and sessionStudent.program_id = 13) as total_nopay_2_ca,
max(sessionStudent.begin_at) as begin_at,
countif(sessionStudent.country_id = 1) as total_completed_booking_Th,
countif(sessionStudent.country_id = 2) as total_completed_booking_Id,
countif(sessionStudent.country_id = 3) as total_completed_booking_VN,
countif(sessionStudent.country_id = 4) as total_completed_booking_Khac
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo
INNER JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst ON bst.student_code = bo.student_code
INNER JOIN (
SELECT bss.student_id, bs.name, bs.teacher_id, bs.rating, date(bs.begin_at) as begin_at, bs.program_id, bstt.country_id
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss
INNER JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs ON bs.id = bss.booking_session_id
INNER JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bstt on bss.student_id = bstt.user_id
WHERE bs.status_id IN (5)
AND bs.program_id IN (8,13)
) sessionStudent ON sessionStudent.student_id = bst.user_id
INNER JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p ON p.user_id = sessionStudent.teacher_id
WHERE  bo.status = 4
AND bo.payment_status = 1
AND cast(bo.payment_content as INT64) in (2, 1)
GROUP BY bo.student_code
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Test_student_teacher_math`
AS -- Data cũ: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1k1SzjiDqt0JNSiDiO6PnPNDQHs4AyM9PdaV6isxUZk4/edit?gid=0#gid=0
-- ngaltt cập nhập ngày 16/08/2024
select 
t1.student_code as MaHV,
sum(t1.nhom_50) as total_hv,
sum(t1.nhom_40) as total_hv_40,
max(t1.email) as Email, 
max(t1.phone_number) as Phone, 
max(t1.name) as GiaoVien,
CASE
    WHEN max (t1.international_country_id) = 1 THEN 'Thailand'
    WHEN max (t1.international_country_id) = 2 THEN 'Indo'
    WHEN max (t1.international_country_id) = 3 THEN 'VietNam'
    WHEN max (t1.international_country_id) = 4 THEN 'Khac'
    WHEN max (t1.international_country_id) = 5 THEN 'Lao'
    WHEN max (t1.international_country_id) = 6 THEN 'Malaysia'
END as QuocGia,
max(t1.international_country_id) as international_country_id,
max (t1.teacher_id) as TeacherID,
-- nhom 50
sum(t1.total_dat) as total_dat,
sum(t1.total_khongdat)  as total_khongdat,
sum(t1.total_duoichuan) as total_duoichuan,
sum(t1.total_nopay) as total_nopay,
-- nhom 40
sum(t1.total_dat_40) as total_dat_40,
sum(t1.total_khongdat_40)  as total_khongdat_40,
sum(t1.total_duoichuan_40) as total_duoichuan_40,
sum(t1.total_nopay_40) as total_nopay_40,

max(t1.begin_at) as begin_at
 from
(
SELECT 
bo.student_code,
bo.email,
bo.phone_number,
bo.international_country_id,
sessionStudent.teacher_id,
sessionStudent.begin_at,
if(sessionStudent.program_id in (47,48,53,54,55,56) and sessionStudent.rating = 2,1,0) as total_dat,
if(sessionStudent.program_id in (47,48,53,54,55,56) and sessionStudent.rating = 1,1,0)  as total_khongdat,
if(sessionStudent.program_id in (47,48,53,54,55,56) and sessionStudent.rating = 3,1,0) as total_duoichuan,
if(sessionStudent.program_id in (47,48,53,54,55,56) and sessionStudent.rating = 4,1,0) as total_nopay,
if(sessionStudent.program_id in (47,48,53,54,55,56), 1, 0) as nhom_50,

if(sessionStudent.program_id in (89,90) and sessionStudent.rating = 2,1,0) as total_dat_40,
if(sessionStudent.program_id in (89,90) and sessionStudent.rating = 1,1,0)  as total_khongdat_40,
if(sessionStudent.program_id in (89,90) and sessionStudent.rating = 3,1,0) as total_duoichuan_40,
if(sessionStudent.program_id in (89,90) and sessionStudent.rating = 4,1,0) as total_nopay_40,
if(sessionStudent.program_id in (89,90), 1, 0) as nhom_40,
p.name
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo
INNER JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst ON bst.student_code = bo.student_code
INNER JOIN (
SELECT bss.student_id, bs.name, bs.teacher_id, bs.rating, date(bs.begin_at) as begin_at, bs.program_id
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss
INNER JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs ON bs.id = bss.booking_session_id
WHERE bs.status_id IN (5)
AND bs.program_id IN (47,48,53,54,55,56,89, 90)
) sessionStudent ON sessionStudent.student_id = bst.user_id
INNER JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p ON p.user_id = sessionStudent.teacher_id
WHERE  bo.status = 4
AND bo.payment_status = 1
AND cast(bo.payment_content as INT64) in (2, 1)
) t1
-- where t1.teacher_id = 1460188
-- and ( t1.begin_at >= '2024-06-01' and t1.begin_at <= '2024-06-30')
GROUP BY t1.student_code
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.aca_acc_cb_teacher_income_estimation_view`
AS WITH
teacher_income_1_1_all AS (
select 
  t1.booking_id,
  t1.booking_time,
  FORMAT_DATE('%b %Y', t1.booking_time) AS month_year,
  t1.booking_type,
  t1.num_shift,
  t1.teacher_name,
  t1.teacher_country,
  t1.booking_status,
  t1.program,
  t1.teacher_id,
  t1.payment_content,
  t1.teacher_source,
  t1.student_country,
  if(sum(t1.revenue) is null,0,sum(t1.revenue)) as revenue_oc,
  if(sum(t1.revenue) is null,0,(sum(t1.revenue) * if(avg(t1.currency_exchange_rate) is null, 1, avg(t1.currency_exchange_rate)))) as revenue_vnd,
  max(s2.sellingEx) as sellingEx,
  max(t1.total_income) as total_income,
  -- if(max(t1.income) is null, 0,max(t1.income))  + if(max(t1.bonus_income) is null, 0, max(t1.bonus_income))
  -- + if(max(bsi.bonus_test_online_early_review) is null, 0, max(bsi.bonus_test_online_early_review))
  -- + if(max(bsi.bonus_test_online_golden_hour) is null, 0, max(bsi.bonus_test_online_golden_hour))
  -- - if(max(bsi.open_webcam_below_standard_penalty) is null, 0, max(bsi.open_webcam_below_standard_penalty))
  -- - if(max(bsi.full_face_below_standard_penalty) is null, 0, max(bsi.full_face_below_standard_penalty))
  -- - if(max(bsi.etiquette_violation_penalty) is null, 0, max(bsi.etiquette_violation_penalty))
  -- - if(max(t1.rating_below_standard_penalty) is null, 0,max(t1.rating_below_standard_penalty)) 
  -- - if(max(t1.cancel_penalty_income) is null, 0, max(t1.cancel_penalty_income))  as total_income
  
from (
SELECT 
  bs.id as booking_id,
  bs.total_income,
  bs.begin_at as booking_time,
  case
  when bs.is_compensatory_course = 1 then 'buoi_bu'
  else 'buoi_chinh_thuc'
  end as booking_type,
  (select max(p.`name`) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = bs.teacher_id) as teacher_name,
  case
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 1 then 'Philippines'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 2 then 'Native'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 3 then 'Vietnamese'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 4 then 'Thailand'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 5 then 'Indonesia'
  when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 8 then 'Laos'
  when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 9 then 'Malaysia'
  end as teacher_country,
  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_status`(bs.status_id, bs.cancel_config_id) as booking_status,
  (select bp.number_of_shift from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.id = bs.program_id ) as num_shift,
  
  (`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_program_name_from_id`(bs.program_id)) as program,
  bs.teacher_id,
  case
    when (select min(bo.payment_content) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo
    where  bo.student_payment_id = bss.student_payment_id) = 1 then 'Buổi Học thử'
    when (select bph.payment_fee from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_payment_history` bph 
    where bph.id = bss.student_payment_id) = 0  then 'Buổi tặng'
    else 'Buổi Ghi danh'
  end as payment_content,
  (select bt.teacher_source from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bs.teacher_id = bt.user_id) as teacher_source,
  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_student_country`((select bst.country_id from  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst 
  where bs.id = bss.booking_session_id and bss.student_id = bst.user_id)) as student_country,
  bss.revenue,
  bss.currency_exchange_rate,
  bs.income,
 (bs.bonus_income + (select max(bse.bonus_excess) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_extend_bonus` bse 
  where bse.booking_id = bs.id)) as bonus_income,
  bs.rating_below_standard_penalty,
  bs.cancel_penalty_income,
  
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs
inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on bs.id = bss.booking_session_id 
--where bs.program_id not in (5,14,15,21,22,46,52,61,62,63,64,65,66,67,88,102)
where bs.program_id not in (select id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program`where type in (2,3,4))
) t1
inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on t1.booking_id = bss.booking_session_id
left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_income` bsi on t1.booking_id = bsi.booking_session_id
join

(select t3.date, t3.sellingEx, t3.teacherCountry,
  lead (t3.date) over (partition by t3.teacherCountry order by t3.date) as next_applied_date
  from kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_teacher_income_ex t3) s2

on date(t1.booking_time) >= s2.date and (date(t1.booking_time) < s2.next_applied_date or s2.next_applied_date is null) and t1.teacher_country = s2.teacherCountry

group by booking_id, booking_time, booking_type, teacher_name, teacher_country, booking_status, program, num_shift, teacher_id, payment_content, teacher_source, student_country
),

table_1_1 AS (
SELECT ti11a.teacher_id, ti11a.teacher_name, ti11a.teacher_source, ti11a.teacher_country, ti11a.sellingEx, SUM(ti11a.total_income) as booking_1_1_income_oc, ti11a.month_year
       
FROM teacher_income_1_1_all ti11a
WHERE --date(ti11a.booking_time) >= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_START_DATE) AND date(ti11a.booking_time) <= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_START_END)
      date(ti11a.booking_time) >= '2024-09-01' --AND date(ti11a.booking_time) <= '2024-09-30' 
GROUP BY ti11a.teacher_id, ti11a.teacher_name, ti11a.teacher_source, ti11a.teacher_country, ti11a.sellingEx, ti11a.month_year
),

teacher_income_1_n_all AS(
select
    t2.*,
    total_income * sellingEX as teacher_income,
    FORMAT_DATE('%b %Y', t2.begin_at) AS month_year,
from
(
select 
  t1.id,
  max(t1.program_name) as program_name,
  MAX(`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_status`(t1.status_id, t1.cancel_config_id)) as booking_status,
  max(t1.teacher_id) as teacher_id,
  max(t1.teacher_name) as teacher_name,
  max(t1.teacher_source) as teacher_source,
  sum(t1.revenue) as revenue,
  max(t1.total_income) as total_income,
  max(t1.begin_at) as begin_at,
  max(teacher_country_booking) as teacher_country_booking,
  max(s2.sellingEx) as sellingEx
from (
SELECT
bs.id,
`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_program_name_from_id`(bs.program_id) as program_name,
bs.status_id as status_id,
bs.cancel_config_id as cancel_config_id,
bs.teacher_id,
( SELECT max(p.`name`) FROM  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p  WHERE p.user_id = bs.teacher_id) AS teacher_name,
 bs.total_income as total_income,
 if(bss.revenue is null,0,(bss.revenue * if(bss.currency_exchange_rate is null, 1, bss.currency_exchange_rate))) AS revenue,
  bs.begin_at,
  case
    when SAFE_CAST(bs.teacher_country_id as INT64) = 1 then 'Philippines'
    when SAFE_CAST(bs.teacher_country_id as INT64) = 2 then 'Native'
    when SAFE_CAST(bs.teacher_country_id as INT64) = 3 then 'Vietnamese'
    when SAFE_CAST(bs.teacher_country_id as INT64) = 4 then 'Thailand'
    when SAFE_CAST(bs.teacher_country_id as INT64) = 5 then 'Indonesia'
      when SAFE_CAST(bs.teacher_country_id as INT64) = 8 then 'Laos'
      when SAFE_CAST(bs.teacher_country_id as INT64) = 9 then 'Malaysia'
  end as teacher_country_booking,
  (select bt.teacher_source from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bs.teacher_id = bt.user_id) as teacher_source,
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs
left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss  on bss.booking_session_id = bs.id
WHERE
     bs.program_id in (select id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program`where  type in (2,3)) 
--bs.program_id in (5,14,15,21,22,46,52,61,62,63,64,65,66,67,88,102) 
--AND (DATE(bs.begin_at) >= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_START_DATE) and DATE(bs.begin_at) <= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_END_DATE))
) t1

left join

(select t3.date, t3.sellingEx, t3.teacherCountry,
  lead (t3.date) over (partition by t3.teacherCountry order by t3.date) as next_applied_date
  from kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_teacher_income_ex t3) s2

on date(t1.begin_at) >= s2.date and (date(t1.begin_at) < s2.next_applied_date or s2.next_applied_date is null) and t1.teacher_country_booking = s2.teacherCountry

group by t1.id
) t2
),

table_1_n AS (
SELECT ti1na.teacher_id, ti1na.teacher_name, ti1na.teacher_source, ti1na.teacher_country_booking as teacher_country, ti1na.sellingEx, SUM(ti1na.total_income) as booking_1_n_income_oc, ti1na.month_year
FROM teacher_income_1_n_all ti1na
WHERE --date(ti1na.begin_at) >= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_START_DATE) AND date(ti1na.begin_at) <= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_START_END)
      date(ti1na.begin_at) >= '2024-09-01' --AND date(ti1na.begin_at) <= '2024-09-30' 
GROUP BY ti1na.teacher_id, ti1na.teacher_name, ti1na.teacher_source, teacher_country, ti1na.sellingEx, ti1na.month_year
),

table_all AS (
SELECT 
      IF(t11.teacher_id is null, t1n.teacher_id, t11.teacher_id) as teacher_id,
      IF(t11.teacher_name is null, t1n.teacher_name, t11.teacher_name) as teacher_name,
      IF(t11.teacher_source is null, t1n.teacher_source, t11.teacher_source) as teacher_source,
      IF(t11.teacher_country is null, t1n.teacher_country, t11.teacher_country) as teacher_country,
      IF(t11.month_year is null, t1n.month_year, t11.month_year) as month_year,      
      IF(t11.sellingEx is null, t1n.sellingEx, t11.sellingEx) as sellingEx,
      IF(t11.booking_1_1_income_oc is null, 0, t11.booking_1_1_income_oc) as booking_1_1_income_oc,
      IF(t1n.booking_1_n_income_oc is null, 0, t1n.booking_1_n_income_oc) as booking_1_n_income_oc,     
FROM table_1_1 t11
FULL JOIN table_1_n t1n ON (t11.teacher_id = t1n.teacher_id and t11.month_year = t1n.month_year) 
)

SELECT *,
      case when teacher_source = 1 then 'Kyna'
           when teacher_source = 3 then 'GGE'
           when teacher_source = 4 then 'Murpher'
           else 'Back Office/Unkown'
      end as `source`,
      CASE
            WHEN teacher_source = 1 AND teacher_country = 'Indonesia' THEN 0.9992430757
            WHEN teacher_source = 1 AND teacher_country = 'Laos' THEN 0.984236616
            WHEN teacher_source = 1 AND teacher_country = 'Malaysia' THEN 1.012263295
            WHEN teacher_source = 1 AND teacher_country = 'Native' THEN 1.006925708
            WHEN teacher_source = 1 AND teacher_country = 'Philippines' THEN 0.998773998
            WHEN teacher_source = 1 AND teacher_country = 'Thailand' THEN 1.000859693
            WHEN teacher_source = 1 AND teacher_country = 'Vietnamese' THEN 1.040027165
            WHEN teacher_source = 3 AND teacher_country = 'Philippines' THEN 0.9956269044
            WHEN teacher_source = 4 AND teacher_country = 'Native' THEN 0.9995901338
      ELSE NULL  -- Add a default value if needed
      END AS rate 
FROM table_all 




;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.aca_ai_tutor_lessons_with_low_rating_feedback_view`
AS WITH ai_topic_add_mode AS 
(
SELECT atp.*, 
       1 as mode,
       (SELECT al.name
        FROM `kynaforkids.ai_level` al WHERE al.id = atp.ai_level_id) as level_name

FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ai_topic` atp 

),

ai_pronunciation_lesson_add_mode AS 
(
SELECT t1.*,
       (SELECT apl.name
        FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ai_pronunciation_level` apl WHERE apl.id = t1.ai_pronunciation_level_id) as level_name
       
FROM
(
SELECT apl.*, 
       2 as mode,
       (SELECT apt.name
        FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ai_pronunciation_topic` apt WHERE apt.id = apl.ai_pronunciation_topic_id) as topic_name,
        (SELECT apt.ai_pronunciation_level_id
        FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ai_pronunciation_topic` apt WHERE apt.id = apl.ai_pronunciation_topic_id) as ai_pronunciation_level_id
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ai_pronunciation_lesson` apl

) t1
),

ai_picture_topic_add_mode AS 
(
SELECT 
        apm.*, 
        3 as mode,
        (SELECT apl.name
        FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ai_picture_mode_level` apl WHERE apl.id = apm.ai_picture_mode_level_id) as level_name

FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ai_picture_mode_topic` apm

),

ai_feedback_get_name AS
(
SELECT ae.*, 
       ap.level_name as pp_level, ap.topic_name as pp_topic, ap.name as pronunc_name, 
       arp.level_name as rp_level, arp.name as roleplay_name, 
       api.level_name as pic_level, api.name as pic_name 

FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ai_tutor_error_report` ae
LEFT JOIN ai_pronunciation_lesson_add_mode ap ON (ae.mode = ap.mode AND ae.reference_id = ap.id)
LEFT JOIN ai_topic_add_mode arp ON (ae.mode = arp.mode AND ae.reference_id = arp.id)
LEFT JOIN ai_picture_topic_add_mode api ON (ae.mode = api.mode AND ae.reference_id = api.id)
),

feedback_table as
(
SELECT *,
       IF(pic_name is null,IF(pronunc_name is null, roleplay_name,pronunc_name),pic_name) as lesson_topic_name,
       IF(pp_level is null,IF(pic_level is null, rp_level,pic_level),pp_level) as level,
       case   when error_type = 2 then "Nội dung hoặc hình ảnh không chính xác"
	       when error_type = 3 then "Chủ đề chưa đáp ứng yêu cầu"
	       when error_type = 4 then "Chấm điểm sai"
              when error_type = 1 then "Vấn đề khác"
       end as `error`
FROM ai_feedback_get_name
WHERE mode is not null
),


ai_rating_get_name AS
(
SELECT ar.*, 
       ap.level_name as pp_level, ap.topic_name as pp_topic, ap.name as pronunc_name, 
       arp.level_name as rp_level, arp.name as roleplay_name, 
       api.level_name as pic_level, api.name as pic_name 

FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ai_tutor_rating` ar
LEFT JOIN ai_pronunciation_lesson_add_mode ap ON (ar.mode = ap.mode AND ar.topic_id = ap.id)
LEFT JOIN ai_topic_add_mode arp ON (ar.mode = arp.mode AND ar.topic_id = arp.id)
LEFT JOIN ai_picture_topic_add_mode api ON (ar.mode = api.mode AND ar.topic_id = api.id)
),


rating_table AS
(
SELECT *,
       IF(pic_name is null,IF(pronunc_name is null, roleplay_name,pronunc_name),pic_name) as lesson_topic_name,
       IF(pp_level is null,IF(pic_level is null, rp_level,pic_level),pp_level) as level,
	 
FROM ai_rating_get_name
),

rating_feedback_table AS
(SELECT 
       IF(rt.mode is null,ft.mode, rt.mode) as mode,
       -- rt.mode, ft.mode,
       IF(rt.level is null,ft.level, rt.level) as level,
       IF(rt.lesson_topic_name is null,ft.lesson_topic_name, rt.lesson_topic_name) as lesson_topic_name,
       -- rt.lesson_topic_name,ft.lesson_topic_name,
       IF(rt.created_by is null,ft.created_by, rt.created_by) as created_by,
       -- rt.created_by, ft.created_by,
       
       
       -- IF(rt.lesson_topic_name is null,ft.lesson_topic_name, rt.lesson_topic_name) as lesson_topic_name,
       AVG(rt.rating) as rating,
       string_agg(rt.comment, ", ") as comment,
       max(if(rt.created_at is not null and ft.created_at is not null, greatest(rt.created_at, ft.created_at), if(rt.created_at is not null,rt.created_at,ft.created_at))) as latest_submitted_at,
       string_agg(ft.error) as `error`,
       string_agg(ft.description) as description,

    

FROM rating_table rt
FULL JOIN feedback_table ft ON (rt.created_by = ft.created_by AND rt.mode = ft.mode AND rt.level = ft.level AND rt.lesson_topic_name = ft.lesson_topic_name)
GROUP BY mode, level, lesson_topic_name, created_by
       --   rt.mode, ft.mode, rt.lesson_topic_name,ft.lesson_topic_name, rt.created_by, ft.created_by
-- ORDER BY length(comment)
),

rating_feedback_table_add_mode_name AS
(
SELECT *,
       case   when mode = 1 then 'Role Play'
	       when mode = 2 then 'Pronunciation'
              when mode = 3 then 'Picture'
              else 'Unknown' 
       end as ai_mode
FROM rating_feedback_table 
)


SELECT ai_mode, level, lesson_topic_name,
       COUNT(rating) as num_rating_1_2,
       string_agg(`comment`) as comments,
       string_agg(`error`) as errors,
       string_agg(`description`) as descriptions,
       max(timestamp_seconds(latest_submitted_at)) as latest_submitted_at,
       
FROM rating_feedback_table_add_mode_name rft
WHERE rating = 1 or rating = 2  
GROUP BY ai_mode, level, lesson_topic_name
HAVING num_rating_1_2 >= 3 OR errors LIKE "%Nội dung hoặc hình ảnh không chính xác"
ORDER BY ai_mode;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.aca_caresoft_log`
(
  id INT64,
  ip_phone STRING,
  phone_number STRING,
  caresoft_data STRING,
  ended_at INT64,
  created_at INT64,
  created_by INT64,
  updated_at INT64,
  updated_by INT64,
  datastream_metadata STRUCT<uuid STRING, source_timestamp INT64>,
  PRIMARY KEY (id) NOT ENFORCED
)
CLUSTER BY id
OPTIONS(
  max_staleness=INTERVAL '0-0 0 0:5:0' YEAR TO SECOND
);

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.aca_student_country`
(
  id INT64,
  user_id INT64,
  subject INT64,
  country_id INT64,
  max_students INT64,
  allow_assign_student INT64,
  created_at INT64,
  updated_at INT64,
  created_by INT64,
  updated_by INT64,
  registered_students INT64,
  datastream_metadata STRUCT<uuid STRING, source_timestamp INT64>,
  PRIMARY KEY (id) NOT ENFORCED
)
CLUSTER BY id;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.aca_tc_interview_list_view`
AS SELECT 
      id, name, email, phone_number,       
      date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(birthday)) as birthday,      
      case when gender = 1 then 'Nam'
           when gender = 2 then 'Nữ'
      end as sex,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country_teacher`(country_id) as country,
      if(is_tester = 1, 'Tester','Giáo viên') as position,
      CONCAT("https://files.kynaenglish.com",link_cv) as link_cv,
      video_link as interview_record,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_email_from_kynaforkids_user`(interview_by) as interview_by,
      date(begin_at) as interview_date, 
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_email_from_kynaforkids_user`(created_by) as created_by,
     
      CASE 
        WHEN training_status = 1 THEN 'Not yet'
        WHEN training_status = 2 THEN 'Done All'
        WHEN training_status = 3 THEN 'Done Test'
        WHEN training_status = 4 THEN 'Done Teaching'
        ELSE 'Unknown'
     END AS training_status_description,

     (select date(bsn.begin_at)
     from `kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
     where bsn.id = booking_training_id) as booked_training_date,


      CASE 
        WHEN candidate_status = 1 THEN 'Not Set'
        WHEN candidate_status = 2 THEN 'Confirm Interview'
        WHEN candidate_status = 3 THEN 'Reject Interview'
        WHEN candidate_status = 4 THEN 'No Show Up'
        WHEN candidate_status = 5 THEN 'Deal'
        WHEN candidate_status = 6 THEN 'Fail'
        WHEN candidate_status = 7 THEN 'Accepted'
        WHEN candidate_status = 8 THEN 'Discarded'
        WHEN candidate_status = 9 THEN 'Offer rejected'
        WHEN candidate_status = 10 THEN 'Pending offer approval'
        WHEN candidate_status = 11 THEN 'Offer not approved'
        WHEN candidate_status = 12 THEN 'Offer sent'
        WHEN candidate_status = 13 THEN 'Pending interview result approval'
        WHEN candidate_status = 14 THEN 'Interview result not approved'
        WHEN candidate_status = 15 THEN 'Interview result approved'
     END AS candidate_status_description,

     point,
     comment,

 



FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.interview_view` 
where subject = 1
      -- and email = "minhle31231024656@gmail.com";

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.aca_training`
(
  id INT64,
  title STRING,
  description STRING,
  max_trainee INT64,
  country_id INT64,
  subject INT64,
  program_id INT64,
  lesson_id INT64,
  schedule_id INT64,
  begin_at INT64,
  end_at INT64,
  trainer_id INT64,
  status_id INT64,
  booking_session_id INT64,
  created_at INT64,
  updated_at INT64,
  created_by INT64,
  updated_by INT64,
  is_test INT64,
  datastream_metadata STRUCT<uuid STRING, source_timestamp INT64>,
  PRIMARY KEY (id) NOT ENFORCED
)
CLUSTER BY id;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.aca_training_sample_record`
(
  booking_id INT64,
  record_url STRING,
  is_hide_face INT64,

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.aca_tuyendung_kho_cv_view`
AS SELECT 
        btl.id,
        btl.name,
        btl.email,
        btl.phone_number,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country_teacher`(btl.country_id) as country,
        case when btl.subject = 1 then 'Tiếng Anh'
             when btl.subject = 2 then 'Toán'
        end as subject_name,

        CASE 
                WHEN btl.recruit_source_id = 1 THEN 'TopCV'
                WHEN btl.recruit_source_id = 2 THEN 'Ybox'
                WHEN btl.recruit_source_id = 3 THEN 'Glints'
                WHEN btl.recruit_source_id = 4 THEN 'LinkedIn'
                WHEN btl.recruit_source_id = 5 THEN 'Indeed'
                WHEN btl.recruit_source_id = 6 THEN 'Website Kyna'
                WHEN btl.recruit_source_id = 7 THEN 'Referral (Bạn giới thiệu)'
                WHEN btl.recruit_source_id = 8 THEN 'Facebook'
                WHEN btl.recruit_source_id = 9 THEN 'Việc làm giáo dục'
                WHEN btl.recruit_source_id = 10 THEN 'Khác'
        END AS recruit_source,

        case when btl.source = 1 then 'Giáo viên'
             when btl.source = 2 then 'Nội bộ'
        end as source_name,
                
        
        case when btl.type = 1 then 'Giáo viên'
             when btl.type = 2 then 'Tester'
        end as type,

        
        CASE 
                WHEN btl.status = 9 THEN 'Đã là giáo viên'
                WHEN btl.status = 10 THEN 'Trùng'
                WHEN btl.status = 1 THEN 'Tạo mới'
                WHEN btl.status = 2 THEN 'Chưa liên hệ được'
                WHEN btl.status = 3 THEN 'Đang liên hệ'
                WHEN btl.status = 4 THEN 'Từ chối'
                WHEN btl.status = 12 THEN 'Đã tạo Candidate'
                WHEN btl.status = 5 THEN 'Đã book lịch phỏng vấn'
                WHEN btl.status = 6 THEN 'Đang chờ duyệt'
                WHEN btl.status = 11 THEN 'Offer sent'
                WHEN btl.status = 7 THEN 'Accepted'
                WHEN btl.status = 8 THEN 'Failed'
                ELSE 'Unknown'
        END AS candidate_status,

        if(btl.status in (1,2,3,4,10) or btl.status = 0 or btl.status is null or btl.status > 12,0,1) as candidate_pass_status,

        concat("https://dashboard.kynaforkids.vn/interview/booking-teacher-lead-action/history?id=",btl.id) as history,

        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_email_from_kynaforkids_user`(btl.created_by) as created_by,
        date(btl.created_at) as created_date,
        date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(btl.recall_date)) as recall_date, 
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_email_from_kynaforkids_user`(btl.created_by) as tc_in_charge,


       

FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher_lead_view` btl;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ai_single_new_students_view`
AS -- CTE 1: Thu thập đơn hàng AI Tutor với lọc sớm
WITH order_ai_tutor AS (
    SELECT 
        ord.id AS order_id,
        COALESCE(
            DATE(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(ord.completed_at)), 
            DATE(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(ord.created_at))
        ) AS accounting_date
    FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` ord
    JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd 
        ON ord.id = ordd.order_id
    LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` pcs 
        ON ordd.package_subscription_id = pcs.id AND ordd.package_combo_id IS NOT NULL
    JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks 
        ON COALESCE(pcs.package_subscription_id, ordd.package_subscription_id) = pks.id
    JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk 
        ON COALESCE(pcs.package_id, ordd.package_id) = pk.id
    WHERE 
        ord.payment_method_status = 2
        AND ord.status = 3
        AND (ord.invoice_code LIKE 'KYNA%' OR ord.invoice_code LIKE 'GRAI%')
        AND (
            (ordd.package_combo_id IS NULL AND pk.name LIKE '%AI Tutor%')
            OR
            (ordd.package_combo_id IS NOT NULL AND pk.name LIKE '%AI%')
        )
),

-- CTE 2: Xác định khách hàng mới
new_customers AS (
    SELECT
        oat.order_id,
        oat.accounting_date,
        CASE
            WHEN oat.accounting_date = DATE(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aov.first_time_purchase_phone)) 
             AND oat.accounting_date = DATE(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aov.first_time_purchase_email))
            THEN 'New Customer'
            ELSE 'Returning Customer'
        END AS customer_type
    FROM order_ai_tutor oat
    LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.Acc_order_video` aov 
        ON oat.order_id = aov.id
    WHERE 
        oat.accounting_date >= '2024-01-01'
)

-- Truy vấn cuối: Đếm học sinh mới theo ngày
SELECT 
    accounting_date AS ngay_hach_toan,
    COUNT(distinct order_id) AS num_new_students_AI_single
FROM new_customers
WHERE customer_type = 'New Customer'
GROUP BY accounting_date
ORDER BY accounting_date DESC;;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission_affiliate_grai`
AS -- doanh thu với đơn ai group talk
SELECT 
	t1.ngay_thu_nhap_grai
	,t1. affiliate_id
	,SUM(CASE WHEN t1.payment_content = 2 THEN (t1.thuc_nhan_hoc_phi + t1.total_video) ELSE 0 END) as tong_tien_lan_dau_grai
	,SUM(CASE WHEN t1.payment_content = 3 THEN ((t1.thuc_nhan_hoc_phi + t1.total_video)) ELSE 0 END) as tra_gop_lan_sau_grai
	,SUM(CASE WHEN t1.payment_content = 4 THEN ((t1.thuc_nhan_hoc_phi + t1.total_video)) ELSE 0 END) as tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_grai
	,SUM(CASE WHEN t1.payment_content = 1 THEN ((t1.thuc_nhan_hoc_phi + t1.total_video)) ELSE 0 END) as tong_tien_hoc_thu_grai
	,SUM(t1.thuc_nhan_hoc_phi + t1.total_video) as tong_thu_nhap_grai
	, COUNT(t1.order_id) as tong_don_grai
FROM
(
	SELECT 
		FORMAT_DATETIME('%Y-%m', bo.accounting_date) AS ngay_thu_nhap_grai
		, bc.affiliate_id
		, ( 
		CASE
		WHEN bo.order_type = 2 THEN bo.revenue_calculate_commission * bo.currency_exchange_rate
		ELSE bo.total * bo.currency_exchange_rate
		END
		) AS thuc_nhan_hoc_phi
		, bo.total_video_course * bo.currency_exchange_rate as total_video
		, bo.payment_content
		, bo.id as order_id
	FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission` bc 
	LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo ON bc.order_id = bo.id
	WHERE bc.status = 3
	AND bo.program_type = 2
        -- AND bc.affiliate_id= 541190 
        -- AND (date(bo.accounting_date) >= '2024-11-01' and date(bo.accounting_date) <= '2024-11-30')
	) t1
	GROUP BY t1.ngay_thu_nhap_grai, t1.affiliate_id


;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission_affiliate_tutoring`
AS -- Doanh thu với đơn tutoring
SELECT 
	t1.ngay_thu_nhap_tutoring
	,t1. affiliate_id
	,SUM(CASE WHEN t1.payment_content = 2 THEN (t1.thuc_nhan_hoc_phi + t1.total_video) ELSE 0 END) as tong_tien_lan_dau_tutoring
	,SUM(CASE WHEN t1.payment_content = 3 THEN ((t1.thuc_nhan_hoc_phi + t1.total_video)) ELSE 0 END) as tra_gop_lan_sau_tutoring
	,SUM(CASE WHEN t1.payment_content = 4 THEN ((t1.thuc_nhan_hoc_phi + t1.total_video)) ELSE 0 END) as tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_tutoring
	,SUM(CASE WHEN t1.payment_content = 1 THEN ((t1.thuc_nhan_hoc_phi + t1.total_video)) ELSE 0 END) as tong_tien_hoc_thu_tutoring
	,SUM(t1.thuc_nhan_hoc_phi + t1.total_video) as tong_thu_nhap_tutoring
  , COUNT(t1.order_id) as tong_don_tutoring
FROM
(
	SELECT 
		FORMAT_DATETIME('%Y-%m', bo.accounting_date) AS ngay_thu_nhap_tutoring
		, bc.affiliate_id
		, ( 
		CASE
		WHEN bo.order_type = 2 THEN bo.revenue_calculate_commission * bo.currency_exchange_rate
		ELSE bo.total * bo.currency_exchange_rate
		END
		) AS thuc_nhan_hoc_phi
		, bo.total_video_course * bo.currency_exchange_rate as total_video
		, bo.payment_content
    , bo.id as order_id
	FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission` bc 
	LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo ON bc.order_id = bo.id
	WHERE bc.status = 3
	AND bo.program_type = 1
  -- AND bc.affiliate_id= 541190 
  -- AND (date(bo.accounting_date) >= '2024-11-01' and date(bo.accounting_date) <= '2024-11-30')
	) t1
	GROUP BY t1.ngay_thu_nhap_tutoring, t1.affiliate_id;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission_db_tutoring`
AS SELECT 
  bo.accounting_date AS ngay_hach_toan
, bo.invoice_code
, bo.currency_exchange_rate
, bo.total
, bc.total_amount
, bc.total_amount * bo.currency_exchange_rate as total_amount_vnd
, ((bo.total - IF(bo.discount_money IS NULL, 0, bo.discount_money)) * bo.currency_exchange_rate)  AS price_vnd
,(
CASE
  WHEN bo.program_type = 1 THEN "Đơn 1 kèm 1"
  WHEN bo.program_type = 2 THEN "Đơn AI kèm Group Talk"
END
) AS loai_don
, (
CASE 
  WHEN bo.user_type_id = 1 THEN 'Trẻ em'
  WHEN bo.user_type_id = 2 THEN 'Người lớn'
END
) AS loai_hoc_vien
, (
CASE
  WHEN bo.student_type = 1 THEN 'Học viên mới'
  WHEN bo.student_type = 2 THEN 'Học viên cũ'
END
) AS student_type
, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(bo.payment_content) AS payment_content
, bo.payment_content as payment_content_id
, bc.affiliate_id as affiliate_id 
, ( SELECT au.country_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
  WHERE au.affiliate_id = CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) ) AS country_id
,(SELECT MAX(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au WHERE au.user_id = u.id AND au.affiliate_id = CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64)) as affiliate_email

, (SELECT ac.name FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au WHERE CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) = au.affiliate_id AND au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as loai_affiliate

, (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  WHERE CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) = au.affiliate_id ) AS affiliate_category_id

, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source_affiliate`((SELECT au.source_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
WHERE CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) = au.affiliate_id)) as nguon_affiliate

, (SELECT au.source_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
WHERE CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) = au.affiliate_id) AS source_id

,(SELECT MAX(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.bd_incharge_id = u.id and au.affiliate_id = cast(bc.affiliate_id as INT64)) as bd_incharge
, (
SELECT 
  ( CASE
    WHEN bacc.payment_count = 1 THEN 'Lần đầu'
    WHEN bacc.payment_count = 2 THEN 'Lần sau'
    ELSE NULL
  END ) as lan_thanh_toan
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_affiliate_commission_config` bacc
WHERE bacc.id = bc.affiliate_commission_config_id
) as lan_thanh_toan
, bc.affiliate_commission_percent_bonus
, bc.affiliate_commission_amount_bonus * bc.currency_exchange_rate AS hoa_hong_vnd
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission` bc 
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo ON bo.id = bc.order_id
WHERE
CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) > 0 and bc.status = 3
-- AND (DATE(bo.accounting_date) >= '2024-11-01' AND DATE(bo.accounting_date) <= '2024-11-30')
--  AND bc.order_id = 115826
-- AND (DATE(bo.accounting_date) >= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_START_DATE) AND DATE(bo.accounting_date) <= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_END_DATE))
  -- and bc.order_id is not null
ORDER BY bc.affiliate_id;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission_db_tutoring_view`
AS SELECT 
  bo.accounting_date AS ngay_hach_toan
, bo.invoice_code
, bo.currency_exchange_rate
, bo.total
, bc.total_amount
, bc.total_amount * bo.currency_exchange_rate as total_amount_vnd
, ((bo.total - IF(bo.discount_money IS NULL, 0, bo.discount_money)) * bo.currency_exchange_rate)  AS price_vnd
,(
CASE
  WHEN bo.program_type = 1 THEN "Đơn 1 kèm 1"
  WHEN bo.program_type = 2 THEN "Đơn AI kèm Group Talk"
END
) AS loai_don
, (
CASE 
  WHEN bo.user_type_id = 1 THEN 'Trẻ em'
  WHEN bo.user_type_id = 2 THEN 'Người lớn'
END
) AS loai_hoc_vien
, (
CASE
  WHEN bo.student_type = 1 THEN 'Học viên mới'
  WHEN bo.student_type = 2 THEN 'Học viên cũ'
END
) AS student_type
, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(bo.payment_content) AS payment_content
, bo.payment_content as payment_content_id
, bc.affiliate_id as affiliate_id 
, ( SELECT au.country_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
  WHERE au.affiliate_id = CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) ) AS country_id
,(SELECT MAX(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au WHERE au.user_id = u.id AND au.affiliate_id = CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64)) as affiliate_email

, (SELECT ac.name FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au WHERE CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) = au.affiliate_id AND au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as loai_affiliate

, (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  WHERE CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) = au.affiliate_id ) AS affiliate_category_id

, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source_affiliate`((SELECT au.source_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
WHERE CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) = au.affiliate_id)) as nguon_affiliate

, (SELECT au.source_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
WHERE CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) = au.affiliate_id) AS source_id

,(SELECT MAX(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.bd_incharge_id = u.id and au.affiliate_id = cast(bc.affiliate_id as INT64)) as bd_incharge
, (
SELECT 
  ( CASE
    WHEN bacc.payment_count = 1 THEN 'Lần đầu'
    WHEN bacc.payment_count = 2 THEN 'Lần sau'
    ELSE NULL
  END ) as lan_thanh_toan,

FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_affiliate_commission_config` bacc
WHERE bacc.id = bc.affiliate_commission_config_id
) as lan_thanh_toan,

case
    when bc.status = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
    when bc.status = 2 then 'Xác nhận'
    when bc.status = 3 then 'Hoàn thành'
    when bc.status = 4 then 'Hủy'
    when bc.status = 10 then 'Quy đổi hoa hồng'
    else 'Khác'
end as aff_commission_status

, bc.affiliate_commission_percent_bonus
, bc.affiliate_commission_amount_bonus * bc.currency_exchange_rate AS hoa_hong_vnd
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission` bc 
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo ON bo.id = bc.order_id
WHERE
CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) > 0 and bc.status in (3,10)
-- AND (DATE(bo.accounting_date) >= '2024-11-01' AND DATE(bo.accounting_date) <= '2024-11-30')
--  AND bc.order_id = 115826
-- AND (DATE(bo.accounting_date) >= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_START_DATE) AND DATE(bo.accounting_date) <= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_END_DATE))
  -- and bc.order_id is not null
ORDER BY bc.affiliate_id;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission_income`
(
  id INT64,
  affiliate_id INT64,
  date INT64,
  total_amount NUMERIC(15, 2),
  total_commission_amount NUMERIC(15, 2),
  total_order INT64,
  total_enrollment_order INT64,
  total_re_register_order INT64,
  re_register_commisson_amount NUMERIC(15, 2),
  enrollment_commission_percent NUMERIC(15, 2),
  enrollment_commisson_amount NUMERIC(15, 2),
  enrollment_commission_percent_bonus NUMERIC(15, 2),
  enrollment_commisson_amount_bonus NUMERIC(15, 2),
  final_total_commission_amount NUMERIC(15, 2),
  created_at INT64,
  updated_at INT64,
  created_by INT64,
  updated_by INT64,
  debt_income NUMERIC(15, 2),
  adjustment_other NUMERIC(15, 2),
  bonus NUMERIC(15, 2),
  payment_adjustment NUMERIC(15, 2),
  datastream_metadata STRUCT<uuid STRING, source_timestamp INT64>,
  PRIMARY KEY (id) NOT ENFORCED
)
CLUSTER BY id;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission_income_affiliate`
AS -- doanh thu tháng
SELECT 
bci.affiliate_id as affiliate_id 
, (select max(u.email) 
  from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au
  where au.user_id = u.id and au.affiliate_id = cast(bci.affiliate_id as INT64)
  ) as affiliate_email
, (
  select max(u.phone_number) 
  from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
  where au.user_id = u.id and au.affiliate_id = cast(bci.affiliate_id as INT64) 
  ) as phone_number
, (
  select max(p.name) 
  from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
  where au.user_id = p.user_id and au.affiliate_id = cast(bci.affiliate_id as INT64) 
  ) as name
, (
  select ac.name 
  from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  
  where cast(bci.affiliate_id as INT64) = au.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id
  ) as loai_affiliate
, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source_affiliate`(au.source_id) as Nguon
, (
  select max(u.email)
  from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au
  where u.id = au.bd_incharge_id and cast(bci.affiliate_id as INT64) = au.affiliate_id ) as bd_incharge
, (
  select 
    ( 
    case 
      when max(ac.status) is null then 'Chưa tạo hợp đồng'
      when max(ac.status) = 1 then 'Đã duyệt'
      when max(ac.status) = 0 then 'Đang chờ duyệt'
      when max(ac.status) = 2 then 'Đã hủy'
    else null
    end ) as trang_thai_hop_dong
  from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_contract` ac 
  where ac.affiliate_id = bci.affiliate_id) as trang_thai_hop_dong
, (
  select max(ac.bank_export_name)
  from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_contract` ac 
  where ac.affiliate_id = au.affiliate_id) as ngan_hang
, FORMAT_DATETIME('%Y-%m', TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(bci.date)) as thang
, bci.total_order as total_order
, bci.total_enrollment_order as tong_don_ghi_danh_lan_dau
, bci.enrollment_commission_percent as phan_tram_lan_dau
, bci.enrollment_commisson_amount as hoa_hong_lan_dau
, bci.enrollment_commission_percent_bonus as phan_tram_lan_dau_bonus
, bci.enrollment_commisson_amount_bonus as hoa_hong_lan_dau_bonus
, bci.total_re_register_order as tong_gon_ghi_danh_lai
, bci.re_register_commisson_amount as hoa_hong_ghi_danh_lai
, bci.final_total_commission_amount as tong_hoa_hong_cuoi
, bci.total_amount as total_amount
-- ngaltt start 22/01/2025
-- , if(bci.total_amount > 0, 'Có','Không') as co_phat_sinh_thu_nhap
, if(bci.total_amount > 0, 1, 0) as co_phat_sinh_thu_nhap
-- ngaltt end 22/01/2025
, bci.bonus as thuong_thang
, bci.debt_income as du_no_ki_truoc
, bci.adjustment_other as dieu_chinh_khac
, bci.payment_adjustment as dieu_chinh_thanh_toan
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission_income` bci 
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au on bci.affiliate_id = au.affiliate_id
WHERE 
au.country_id = 3
-- AND au.affiliate_id = 541189
-- AND FORMAT_DATETIME('%Y-%m', TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(bci.date)) = '2024-10'
;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_income`
(
  booking_session_id INT64,
  open_webcam_below_standard_penalty NUMERIC(15, 2),
  full_face_below_standard_penalty FLOAT64,
  etiquette_violation_penalty NUMERIC(15, 2),
  bonus_test_online_early_review NUMERIC(15, 2),
  bonus_test_online_golden_hour NUMERIC(15, 2),
  created_at INT64,
  updated_at INT64,
  created_by INT64,
  updated_by INT64,
  datastream_metadata STRUCT<uuid STRING, source_timestamp INT64>,
  hot_bonus_income NUMERIC(15, 2),
  duo_bonus_income NUMERIC(15, 2),
  PRIMARY KEY (booking_session_id) NOT ENFORCED
)
CLUSTER BY booking_session_id;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_income_view`
AS SELECT  
      bs.id as booking_session_id,
      bsi.* EXCEPT(booking_session_id, created_at, updated_at),   
           
      brb.bonus as replacement_bonus,     
      -- bsi.hot_bonus_income,   
      (bs.bonus_income + 
      (select max(bse.bonus_excess) 
        from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_extend_bonus` bse 
        where bse.booking_id = bs.id)) as performance_bonus,        
      bs.rating_below_standard_penalty,        
      bs.cancel_penalty_income,        
      bs.income,        
      timestamp_seconds(bsi.created_at) as created_at,                
      timestamp_seconds(bsi.updated_at) as updated_at,
-- FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_income` bsi
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session` bs
left join `kynaforkids.booking_session_income` bsi on bs.id = bsi.booking_session_id
left join `kynaforkids.booking_replacement_bonus` brb on brb.booking_id = bs.id
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view`
AS SELECT * except(begin_at,end_at,created_at,updated_at,last_action_at,teacher_note_at),
      timestamp_seconds(begin_at) as begin_at,
      timestamp_seconds(end_at) as end_at,
      timestamp_seconds(created_at) as created_at,
      timestamp_seconds(updated_at) as updated_at,
      timestamp_seconds(last_action_at) as last_action_at,
      timestamp_seconds(teacher_note_at) as teacher_note_at,

      case when bs.status_id = 5 then 'Completed'
           when bs.status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id in (2,5,6,9,12) then 'Cancel không bù'
      end as completed_or_ko_bu,

      case when (bs.total_income is null or bs.total_income = 0) then 'income_null_0'
           else 'income_occured'
      end as income_type
      
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session` bs;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_view`
AS SELECT         
    * EXCEPT(start_at, expired_at,created_at,updated_at),       
    TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(start_at) as start_at,       
    TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(expired_at) as expired_at,       
    TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(created_at) as created_at,       
    TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(updated_at) as updated_at
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student`;

(

  income_basic_salary_approve_of_official_program NUMERIC(15, 2),
  num_of_qualified_class_of_official_program INT64,
  income_of_qualified_class_of_official_program NUMERIC(15, 2),
  datastream_metadata STRUCT<uuid STRING, source_timestamp INT64>,
  income_of_duo_bonus NUMERIC(15, 2),

);

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher_income_view`
AS SELECT bti.* except(`date`,created_at,updated_at),
      timestamp_seconds(bti.`date`) as `date`,
      timestamp_seconds(bti.created_at) as created_at,
      timestamp_seconds(bti.updated_at) as updated_at,
      FORMAT_DATETIME('%Y-%m', timestamp_seconds(bti.`date`)) AS year_month,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country_teacher`(bt.country_id) as teacherCountry 


FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher_income` bti
left join `kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt on bti.teacher_id = bt.user_id
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_affiliate_referral_cost_view`
AS with 
affiliate_vn_finalized_cost as
(
SELECT 
thang as year_month
-- , SUM(total_order) as total_order
-- , SUM(tong_don_ghi_danh_lan_dau) as tong_don_ghi_danh_lan_dau
-- , SUM(hoa_hong_lan_dau) as hoa_hong_lan_dau
-- , SUM(hoa_hong_lan_dau_bonus) as affiliate_cost --hoa_hong_lan_dau_bonus
-- , SUM(tong_tien_lan_dau_grai) as tong_tien_lan_dau_grai
-- , round(SUM(tong_tien_lan_dau)) as tong_tien_lan_dau
, SUM(tong_hoa_hong_cuoi) + SUM(hoa_hong_video) as tong_hoa_hong_cuoi
, SUM(thuong_thang) as thuong_thang
, SUM(dieu_chinh_khac) as dieu_chinh_khac

-- phần điều chỉnh cho giống số của Kế toán
, round(SUM(tong_hoa_hong_cuoi) + SUM(hoa_hong_video) + SUM(thuong_thang) +  SUM(dieu_chinh_khac)) as affiliate_cost

FROM
(
SELECT * FROM
(
SELECT 
ba.*
-- tutoring
, bt.tong_tien_lan_dau_tutoring
, (bt.tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_tutoring + bt.tra_gop_lan_sau_tutoring + bt.tong_tien_hoc_thu_tutoring) as tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_tutoring
, bt.tong_thu_nhap_tutoring
, bt.tong_don_tutoring
-- ai group talk
, bg.tong_tien_lan_dau_grai
, (bg.tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_grai + bg.tra_gop_lan_sau_grai + bg.tong_tien_hoc_thu_grai) as tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_grai
, bg.tong_thu_nhap_grai
, bg.tong_don_grai
-- Tổng tutoring và group talk
, ( if(bt.tong_tien_lan_dau_tutoring is not null,bt.tong_tien_lan_dau_tutoring, 0) + if(bg.tong_tien_lan_dau_grai is not null,bg.tong_tien_lan_dau_grai, 0 )) as tong_tien_lan_dau
, (if(bt.tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_tutoring is not null,bt.tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_tutoring, 0)  + if( bt.tra_gop_lan_sau_tutoring is not null, bt.tra_gop_lan_sau_tutoring, 0) + if(bt.tong_tien_hoc_thu_tutoring is not null, bt.tong_tien_hoc_thu_tutoring, 0)) 
+ (if(bg.tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_grai is not null, bg.tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_grai, 0) + if(bg.tra_gop_lan_sau_grai is not null, bg.tra_gop_lan_sau_grai, 0) + if(bg.tong_tien_hoc_thu_grai is not null, bg.tong_tien_hoc_thu_grai, 0)) as tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai
, (if(bt.tong_thu_nhap_tutoring is not null, bt.tong_thu_nhap_tutoring, 0) + if(bg.tong_thu_nhap_grai is not null, bg.tong_thu_nhap_grai, 0)) as tong_thu_nhap
, 0 as doanh_thu_video
, 0 as hoa_hong_video
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission_income_affiliate` ba
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission_affiliate_tutoring` bt on ba.thang = bt.ngay_thu_nhap_tutoring and ba.affiliate_id = bt.affiliate_id
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission_affiliate_grai` bg on ba.thang = bg.ngay_thu_nhap_grai and ba.affiliate_id = bg.affiliate_id
) t1 
UNION ALL 
SELECT * FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.commission_income_affiliate_video`
) t2
-- WHERE t2.affiliate_id = 542135
-- and t2.thang = '2024-10' 
GROUP BY t2.thang
order by year_month desc
),

aff_lao_cost_detail as 
(
SELECT 
  
	--   (select max(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.user_id = u.id and au.affiliate_id = cast(bc.affiliate_id as INT64)) as affiliate_email,
	coalesce(bo.accounting_date, bo.created_at) as ngay_hach_toan,
   
(select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = bo.created_by) as sale_incharge,
((bo.total - if(bo.discount_money IS NULL, 0, bo.discount_money) + if(bo.total_video_course IS NULL, 0, bo.total_video_course)) * bo.currency_exchange_rate) AS total_vnd,
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission` bc 
  left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo on bo.id = bc.order_id
  WHERE cast(bc.affiliate_id as INT64) in (1235265, 1233043) and bc.order_id is not null
        and bo.payment_content in (2)
        and bc.status in (3)
        and bo.status in (4)
),

aff_lao_cost as
(
select 
      format_datetime("%Y-%m", afl.ngay_hach_toan) as year_month,
      coalesce(sum(
          case when afl.sale_incharge = 'luan.nt@kynaforkids.vn' then round(0.45*(afl.total_vnd))
               else round(0.33*(afl.total_vnd))
          end
      ),0) as aff_lao_commission


from aff_lao_cost_detail afl
where format_datetime("%Y-%m", afl.ngay_hach_toan) >= '2024-01'
group by year_month
),

aff_viet_current_month_detail as
(
SELECT bc.id,

    -- bc.affiliate_id as affiliate_id, 
    -- bo.accounting_date as ngay_hach_toan,
    -- bc.affiliate_commission_percent as phan_tram_hoa_hong, 
    bc.affiliate_commission_amount as affiliate_commission_amount,
--     bo.total_video_course as total_video,
--     bc.test_online_bonus,
--   	bc.country_id,
--     bc.affiliate_commission_percent_bonus,
--     bc.affiliate_commission_amount_bonus,
-- bc.total_amount* bc.currency_exchange_rate as total_new
-- , if(bo.program_type = 2, 'AI kèm Group talk', 'Đơn 1-1') as program_type
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission` bc 
  left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo on bo.id = bc.order_id
  WHERE cast(bc.affiliate_id as INT64) > 0 and bc.status = 3 and bo.order_type != 5 
  and FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m',bo.accounting_date) = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', current_date())
  and bc.country_id = 3
  and (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  where cast(bc.affiliate_id as INT64) = au.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) in ('Customer referral', 'Distribution Partner')
),

aff_viet_previous_month_detail as
(
  SELECT 
    bc.id,
    bc.affiliate_commission_amount as affiliate_commission_amount_previous
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_commission` bc 
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo ON bo.id = bc.order_id
  WHERE CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) > 0 
    AND bc.status = 3 
    AND bo.order_type != 5 
    -- PHẦN SỬA ĐỔI CHÍNH Ở ĐÂY:
    AND FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', bo.accounting_date) = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
    -- HẾT PHẦN SỬA ĐỔI
    AND bc.country_id = 3
    AND (
      SELECT ac.name 
      FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, 
           `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  
      WHERE CAST(bc.affiliate_id AS INT64) = au.affiliate_id 
        AND au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id
    ) IN ('Customer referral', 'Distribution Partner')
),

aff_vn_current_month as
(
select 
      SUM(affiliate_commission_amount) as aff_vn_cost_current_month
from aff_viet_current_month_detail
),

aff_vn_previous_month as
(
select 
      SUM(affiliate_commission_amount_previous) as aff_vn_cost_previous_month
from aff_viet_previous_month_detail
),

affiliate_cost as 
(
select 
      ym.year_month,
      afc.* except(year_month, affiliate_cost),
      case when ym.year_month < FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', date_sub(current_date(),interval 8 day)) then coalesce(afc.affiliate_cost,0) + coalesce(alc.aff_lao_commission,0) 
           when ym.year_month < FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', current_date()) and ym.year_month = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', date_sub(current_date(),interval 8 day)) then (select coalesce(aff_vn_cost_previous_month,0) from aff_vn_previous_month) + coalesce(alc.aff_lao_commission,0)
           when ym.year_month = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', current_date()) then (select coalesce(aff_vn_cost_current_month,0) from aff_vn_current_month) + coalesce(alc.aff_lao_commission,0)
      end as affiliate_cost,
from affiliate_vn_finalized_cost afc
left join aff_lao_cost alc using(year_month)
full join `kynaforkids.cac_year_month_table` ym using(year_month)
where ym.year_month <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', current_date())
order by year_month desc
)

select 
       ac.year_month,
       ac.affiliate_cost
from affiliate_cost ac
order by year_month desc

-- affiliate_cost_temp as 
-- (
-- select 
--       ym.year_month,
--       afc.* except(year_month, affiliate_cost),
--       afc.affiliate_cost + alc.aff_lao_commission as affiliate_cost,
--       if(afc.affiliate_cost is not null and ym.year_month < FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', current_date()), 1, 0) as is_cost_finalized,      

-- from affiliate_vn_all_cost afc

-- where ym.year_month <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', current_date())
