CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_cost_thu_ho_cash_collection_view`
AS WITH 
tutoring_new_students AS (
    SELECT
        DATE(IF(bo.accounting_date IS NULL, bo.created_at, bo.accounting_date)) AS ngay_hach_toan,
        SUM((bo.total - COALESCE(bo.discount_money, 0) + COALESCE(bo.total_video_course, 0)) * bo.currency_exchange_rate) AS total_tutoring_order_value
    FROM
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
    WHERE
        DATE(IF(bo.accounting_date IS NULL, bo.created_at, bo.accounting_date)) >= '2024-01-01'
        AND bo.payment_status IN (0, 1, 3)
        AND bo.status IN (4, 6)
        AND bo.payment_content in (2,3,4)
        AND (bo.total - COALESCE(bo.discount_money, 0) + COALESCE(bo.total_video_course, 0)) > 0
        AND (
            ((bo.student_id IS NOT NULL OR bo.student_code IS NOT NULL)
            AND NOT EXISTS (
                SELECT 1
                FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo2
                WHERE (bo2.student_id = bo.student_id OR bo2.student_code = bo.student_code)
                  AND bo2.payment_status IN (0, 1, 3)
                  AND bo2.status IN (4, 6)
                  AND bo2.payment_content in (2,3,4)
                  AND DATE(bo2.accounting_date) < DATE(IF(bo.accounting_date IS NULL, bo.created_at, bo.accounting_date))
            ))
            OR
            ((bo.student_id IS NULL AND bo.student_code IS NULL)
            AND NOT EXISTS (
                SELECT 1
                FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo2
                WHERE RIGHT(bo2.phone_number, 9) = RIGHT(bo.phone_number, 9)
                  AND bo2.payment_status IN (0, 1, 3)
                  AND bo2.status IN (4, 6)
                  AND bo2.payment_content in (2,3,4)
                  AND DATE(bo2.accounting_date) < DATE(IF(bo.accounting_date IS NULL, bo.created_at, bo.accounting_date))
            ))
        )
    GROUP BY
        ngay_hach_toan
),
ai_single_new_students AS (
    SELECT
        DATE(IF(ord.completed_at IS NULL, TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(ord.created_at), TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(ord.completed_at))) AS ngay_hach_toan,
        SUM(ord.total * ord.currency_exchange_rate) AS total_ai_single_order_value
    FROM
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` ord
    WHERE
        ord.invoice_code LIKE 'KYNA%'
        AND ord.payment_method_status IN (2, 4, 5, 6)
        AND ord.status IN (2, 3)
        AND DATE(IF(ord.completed_at IS NULL, TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(ord.created_at), TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(ord.completed_at))) >= '2024-01-01'
        AND EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd
            LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON ordd.package_id = pk.id
            WHERE ordd.order_id = ord.id
            AND (
                (ordd.package_combo_id IS NULL AND pk.name LIKE '%AI Tutor%')
                OR
                (ordd.package_combo_id IS NOT NULL AND EXISTS (
                    SELECT 1
                    FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` pcs
                    LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk2 ON pcs.package_id = pk2.id
                    WHERE pcs.id = ordd.package_subscription_id
                    AND pk2.name LIKE '%AI%'
                ))
            )
        )
        AND EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_order_video` aov
            WHERE aov.id = ord.id
            AND aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_phone
            AND aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_email
        )
    GROUP BY
        ngay_hach_toan
)
SELECT
    COALESCE(tns.ngay_hach_toan, ais.ngay_hach_toan) AS ngay_hach_toan,
    COALESCE(tns.total_tutoring_order_value, 0) AS total_tutoring_order_value,
    COALESCE(ais.total_ai_single_order_value, 0) AS total_ai_single_order_value,
    ROUND(COALESCE(tns.total_tutoring_order_value, 0) + COALESCE(ais.total_ai_single_order_value, 0)) AS total_order_value,
    ROUND(0.01 * (COALESCE(tns.total_tutoring_order_value, 0) + COALESCE(ais.total_ai_single_order_value, 0))) AS cash_collection_cost
FROM
    tutoring_new_students tns
FULL JOIN
    ai_single_new_students ais
ON
    tns.ngay_hach_toan = ais.ngay_hach_toan
ORDER BY
    ngay_hach_toan DESC
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_cost_thu_ho_cash_collection_view_2`
AS WITH 
tutoring_new_students AS 
(
WITH order_info AS (
  (SELECT date(bo.created_at) AS ngay_tao_don,
          date(bo.payment_at) AS ngay_duyet_don,
          if(bo.accounting_date IS NULL, date(bo.created_at), bo.accounting_date) AS accounting_date,

     (SELECT created_at
      FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
      WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS ngay_tao_lead,
          bo.invoice_code,

     -- (SELECT name
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
     --  WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS ten_phu_huynh,
          -- bo.email,
          -- bo.name,
          bo.student_code,
          bo.student_id,
          bo.phone_number,
          bo.id as order_id,
          bo.international_country_id,
          if(bo.total_video_course IS NULL, 0, bo.total_video_course) AS total_video_course,
          bo.total,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(cast(bo.payment_content AS INT64)) AS noi_dung_thanh_toan,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source`(bo.source) AS source,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_program_name_from_id`(bo.program_id) AS program,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_order_status`(bo.status) AS order_status,
          CASE WHEN bo.payment_status = 0 THEN 'Chưa duyệt' 
               WHEN bo.payment_status = 1 THEN 'Đã duyệt' 
               WHEN bo.payment_status = 2 THEN 'Không duyệt' 
               WHEN bo.payment_status = 3 THEN 'Cần điều chỉnh' 
               WHEN bo.payment_status = 4 THEN 'Đã điều chỉnh' 
               ELSE 'Khác' END AS payment_status,
          bo.total - if(bo.discount_money IS NULL, 0, bo.discount_money) AS price,
          -- bo.duration,
          -- bo.note AS note,
          bo.lead_id AS lead_id,
          -- bll.gclid,

     -- (SELECT sale_id
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
     --  WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS sale_id,
     
     IF (bll.actual_utm_campaign IS NULL,
                                   bll.utm_campaign,
                                   bll.actual_utm_campaign) AS affiliate_campaign,
    --  bll.actual_utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign, 
    --  (SELECT actual_lead_id
    --   FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
    --   WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS actual_lead_id,
    --       if(bll.actual_lead_id IS NULL, bll.utm_campaign,
    --            (SELECT bl.utm_campaign
    --             FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl
    --             WHERE bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) AS affiliate_campaign,

     -- (SELECT fanpage_name
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
     --  WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS fanpage_name,
          -- if(bll.actual_lead_id IS NULL, bll.landing_page_name,
          --      (SELECT bl.landing_page_name
          --       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl
          --       WHERE bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) AS landingpage_name,
          -- if(bll.actual_lead_id IS NULL, bll.affiliate_id,
          --      (SELECT bl.affiliate_id
          --       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl
          --       WHERE bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) AS affiliate_id,
          bo.currency_exchange_rate,
          ((bo.total - if(bo.discount_money IS NULL, 0, bo.discount_money)) * bo.currency_exchange_rate) AS price_vnd,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(bo.international_country_id) AS country,
          -- bo.total_lesson,

     -- (SELECT string_agg(t1.video_course_name)
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.view_tutoring_video_course_name` t1
     --  WHERE t1.id = bo.id) AS video_course_name,
          -- if(bll.actual_lead_id IS NULL,
          --      (SELECT max(u.email)
          --       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.kynaforkids_user` u
          --       WHERE bll.affiliate_id = u.id),
          --      (SELECT max(u.email)
          --       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.kynaforkids_user` u
          --       WHERE bll.actual_lead_id = bl.id
          --         AND bl.affiliate_id = u.id)) AS affiliate_email,

     -- (SELECT max(u.email)
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.kynaforkids_user` u,
     --       `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au
     --  WHERE au.affiliate_id = bo.affiliate_id
     --    AND au.user_id = u.id) AS affiliate_emaill,

     -- (SELECT ac.name
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
     --       `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au
     --  WHERE bo.affiliate_id = au.affiliate_id
     --    AND au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) AS loai_affiliate,
          -- IF (bll.actual_lead_id IS NULL,
          --       (SELECT ac.name
          --        FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
          --             `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac
          --        WHERE bll.affiliate_id = au.user_id
          --          AND au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id),
          --       (SELECT ac.name
          --        FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl,
          --             `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
          --             `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac
          --        WHERE bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id
          --          AND bl.affiliate_id = au.user_id
          --          AND au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id)) AS affiliate_type
   FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
   LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bll ON bll.id = bo.lead_id

--    WHERE DATE(bo.created_at) >= '2024-08-01' 
   )
),

temp_table as
(
SELECT 
       t1.order_id,
       t1.ngay_tao_don,
       t1.ngay_duyet_don,
       t1.accounting_date,
       t1.ngay_tao_lead,
       t1.invoice_code,
     --   t1.ten_phu_huynh,
     --   t1.email,
     --   t1.name,
     --   t1.student_code,
       t1.phone_number,
       t1.international_country_id as country_id,
       t1.total_video_course,
       t1.total,
       t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan,
       t1.source,
       t1.program,
       t1.order_status,
       t1.payment_status,
     --   t1.price,
       ((t1.price + t1.total_video_course) * t1.currency_exchange_rate) AS total_VND,
     --   (t1.price + t1.total_video_course) AS total_nguyen_te,
     --   t1.duration,
     --   t1.note,
       t1.lead_id,
     --   `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_email_from_kynaforkids_user`(t1.sale_id) AS sale_email,
       t1.affiliate_campaign,
     --   t1.landingpage_name,
     --   t1.fanpage_name,
     --   t1.gclid,
     --   t1.affiliate_id,
     --   t1.affiliate_email,
     --   t1.affiliate_type,
     --   t1.currency_exchange_rate,
     --   t1.price_vnd,
       t1.country,
     --   t1.total_lesson,
     --   t1.video_course_name,
     --   t1.affiliate_emaill,
     --   t1.loai_affiliate
      t1.student_id,
      t1.student_code,
      (
         SELECT COUNT(distinct bo.id) 
         FROM `kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo 
         WHERE (bo.student_id = t1.student_id OR bo.student_code = t1.student_code) AND bo.payment_status in (0,1,3) AND bo.status in (4,6) AND `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(cast(bo.payment_content AS INT64)) in ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') AND date(bo.accounting_date) <= date(t1.accounting_date)
      ) as num_completed_orders_same_student, 

        (
         SELECT COUNT(distinct bo.id) 
         FROM `kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo 
         WHERE (RIGHT(bo.phone_number,9) = RIGHT(t1.phone_number,9)) AND bo.payment_status in (0,1,3) AND bo.status in (4,6) AND `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(cast(bo.payment_content AS INT64)) in ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') AND date(bo.accounting_date) <= date(t1.accounting_date)
      ) as num_completed_orders_same_phone,

FROM order_info t1
WHERE 
      -- t1.source = 'Marketing'  
      t1.accounting_date >= '2024-01-01' 
      AND t1.payment_status in ('Đã duyệt','Chưa duyệt','Cần điều chỉnh') 
      AND t1.order_status in ('Hoàn thành', 'Chờ xác nhận thanh toán')
      AND t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan in ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
      AND (t1.price + t1.total_video_course) > 0
      -- AND t1.ngay_tao_lead >= '2024-01-01'
)

SELECT 
        date(accounting_date) as ngay_hach_toan,
        SUM(total_VND) as total_tutoring_order_value,
FROM
(SELECT 
       accounting_date,total_VND,
       if(not(student_id is null AND student_code is null),if(t2.num_completed_orders_same_student > 1, 'Học viên cũ', 'Học viên mới'),if(t2.num_completed_orders_same_phone > 1, 'có order cùng phone chưa rõ HV cũ/mới', 'Học viên mới')) as old_new_student,
       

FROM temp_table t2
-- WHERE not(student_id is null AND student_code is null)
)
WHERE old_new_student = 'Học viên mới'
GROUP BY ngay_hach_toan -- có thể group theo cả country nữa
ORDER BY ngay_hach_toan desc
),

ai_single_new_students AS 
(
WITH 
order_ai_tutor_single AS
(SELECT 
        --ord.*,
        ord.id as order_id,
        date(timestamp_seconds(ord.created_at)) as created_at,
      --   date(ord.updated_at) as updated_at,
        date(timestamp_seconds(ord.completed_at)) as completed_at,
      --   ord.created_by,
      --   ord.telesale_id,
        ord.register_source,        
        ord.country_id,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(ord.country_id) as country,
        ord.currency_exchange_rate,
        ord.total as total_oc,
        
        
       -- ord.user_id,
        ori.phone_number as order_phone_number,
        ori.email as order_email,
        ori.lead_id,
      --   if((ori.phone_number) in (SELECT * FROM users_1_1_phone_number),"Đã học 1-1","Chưa học 1-1") as check_1_1, 

        

        ord.invoice_code as order_code,
        ord.status as order_status_id,
        ord.payment_method_id,
        ord.payment_method_status as payment_status_id,
        ord.affiliate_id,
        (SELECT email FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user us WHERE ord.affiliate_id = us.id) as affiliate_email,
        (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user au WHERE au.user_id = ord.affiliate_id) as affiliate_category_id,
        ord.utm_campaign,


        ordd.package_id,
        ordd.package_subscription_id,
        pks.subscription_month,
        pks.name as subscription_name,
        pks.price as subscription_price,
        pk.name as package_name,

        
       
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` ord
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd ON (ord.id = ordd.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori ON (ord.id = ori.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks ON (ordd.package_subscription_id = pks.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = ordd.package_id)



WHERE 
      ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%'
      AND pk.name like '%AI Tutor%'
      AND ordd.package_combo_id is null
),

order_ai_tutor_combo AS
(SELECT 
        --ord.*,
        ord.id as order_id,
        date(timestamp_seconds(ord.created_at)) as created_at,
      --   date(ord.updated_at) as updated_at,
        date(timestamp_seconds(ord.completed_at)) as completed_at,
      --   ord.created_by,
      --   ord.telesale_id,
        ord.register_source,        
        ord.country_id,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(ord.country_id) as country,
        ord.currency_exchange_rate,
        ord.total as total_oc,
        
        
       -- ord.user_id,
        ori.phone_number as order_phone_number,
        ori.email as order_email,
        ori.lead_id,
      --   if((ori.phone_number) in (SELECT * FROM users_1_1_phone_number),"Đã học 1-1","Chưa học 1-1") as check_1_1, 


        -- ord.invoice_code as order_code,
        -- ord.status as order_status_id,
        -- case when ord.status = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
        --      when ord.status = 2 then 'Đã xác nhận'
        --      when ord.status = 3 then 'Hoàn thành'
        --      when ord.status = 4 then 'Hủy'
        --      when ord.status = 5 then 'Đã hoàn tiền'   
        -- end as order_status,

        -- ord.payment_method_id,
        -- ord.payment_method_status,
        
        -- ord.affiliate_id,  
        -- ord.affiliate_email,
        -- ord.affiliate_category_name,
        

        ord.invoice_code as order_code,
        ord.status as order_status_id,
        ord.payment_method_id,
        ord.payment_method_status as payment_status_id,
        ord.affiliate_id,
        (SELECT email FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user us WHERE ord.affiliate_id = us.id) as affiliate_email,
        (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user au WHERE au.user_id = ord.affiliate_id) as affiliate_category_id,
        ord.utm_campaign,


        ordd.package_id,
        ordd.package_subscription_id,
        pks.subscription_month,
        pks.name as subscription_name,
        pks.price as subscription_price,
        pk.name as package_name,


        
       
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` ord
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd ON (ord.id = ordd.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori ON (ord.id = ori.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` pcs ON (ordd.package_subscription_id = pcs.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks ON (pcs.package_subscription_id = pks.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = pcs.package_id)
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = ordd.package_combo_id)


WHERE 
      ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%'
      AND pk.name like '%AI%'
      AND ordd.package_combo_id is not null
),

order_ai_tutor AS
(
SELECT country_id,order_id,payment_status_id,order_status_id,lead_id,total_oc,currency_exchange_rate,affiliate_category_id,completed_at,created_at FROM order_ai_tutor_single

UNION ALL

SELECT country_id,order_id,payment_status_id,order_status_id,lead_id,total_oc,currency_exchange_rate,affiliate_category_id,completed_at,created_at  FROM order_ai_tutor_combo

),

temp_table as 
(

SELECT 
      country_id,order_id,payment_status_id,order_status_id,lead_id,total_oc,currency_exchange_rate,
      (SELECT ac.name FROM `kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac WHERE ac.id = oat.affiliate_category_id) AS affiliate_category_name,
      if(oat.completed_at is null, oat.created_at, oat.completed_at) as created_at,
FROM order_ai_tutor oat
),

single_ai_order as (
SELECT   
         tt.created_at as ngay_hach_toan,
        (select blv.affiliate_campaign from `kynaforkids.mkt_booking_lead_view` blv
         where blv.id = tt.lead_id) as utm_campaign,
         tt.country_id,
         tt.lead_id,

         tt.total_oc,
         tt.currency_exchange_rate,

        --  tt.total_oc * tt.currency_exchange_rate as total_VND,
         tt.order_id,
         case 
              when tt.country_id = 3 then 1
              when tt.country_id = 1 then 
                  (SELECT ce.rate FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.currency_exchange_config` ce 
                    WHERE ce.from = 'THB' and ce.to = 'VND' and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_start)) <= tt.created_at and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_end)) >= tt.created_at)
              when tt.country_id = 2 then 
                  (SELECT ce.rate FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.currency_exchange_config` ce 
                    WHERE ce.from = 'IDR' and ce.to = 'VND' and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_start)) <= tt.created_at and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_end)) >= tt.created_at)
               when tt.country_id = 5 then 
                  (SELECT ce.rate FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.currency_exchange_config` ce 
                    WHERE ce.from = 'KIP' and ce.to = 'VND' and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_start)) <= tt.created_at and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_end)) >= tt.created_at)      
         else null
     end as ty_gia,

      case
              when aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_phone then 'New Customers'
              else 'Returning Customers'
      end as type_order_phone,
      case
              when aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_email then 'New Customers'
              else 'Returning Customers'
      end as type_order_email
FROM temp_table tt
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.Acc_order_video` aov ON (tt.order_id = aov.id)

WHERE 
      tt.created_at >= '2024-08-01' --and tt.created_at <= '2024-10-31'
      and tt.payment_status_id in (2,4,5,6)
      and tt.order_status_id in (2,3)
)

SELECT 
      sao.ngay_hach_toan,
      -- COUNT(distinct sao.order_id) as num_new_students_AI_single,
      SUM(sao.ty_gia * sao.total_oc) as total_ai_single_order_value

FROM single_ai_order sao
WHERE sao.type_order_email = 'New Customers' and sao.type_order_phone = 'New Customers' 
GROUP BY sao.ngay_hach_toan       -- có thể group theo country nữa
ORDER BY sao.ngay_hach_toan DESC
)


SELECT
      if(tns.ngay_hach_toan is null, ais.ngay_hach_toan, tns.ngay_hach_toan) as ngay_hach_toan,
      ROUND(0.01*(if(tns.total_tutoring_order_value is null, 0, tns.total_tutoring_order_value)  + if(ais.total_ai_single_order_value is null, 0, ais.total_ai_single_order_value))) as cash_collection_cost

FROM tutoring_new_students tns
FULL JOIN ai_single_new_students ais ON(tns.ngay_hach_toan = ais.ngay_hach_toan)  -- có thể group theo ngay hạch toán và cả country, hiện chưa làm tới mức country
ORDER BY ngay_hach_toan DESC



;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_digital_mkt_spending_view`
AS WITH 
aff_campaign_inf AS
(
  SELECT
    aci.`campaign_id`,
    ac.name as campaign_name,
    date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aci.`date`)+ INTERVAL 7 HOUR) as date_spend,
    aci.`spend`,
    ac.account_id,
    ac.channel_id,
    ac.effective_status,
    ac.product_id,
    ac.user_id,
    ac.country_id,
    ac.line_id,
  
    CASE
          WHEN ac.channel_id = 1 AND  date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aci.`date`)+ INTERVAL 7 HOUR) >= '2025-03-01' THEN ROUND(1.05 * aci.spend)
          WHEN ac.channel_id = 1 AND  date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aci.`date`)+ INTERVAL 7 HOUR) < '2025-03-01' THEN ROUND(1.07 * aci.spend)
          WHEN ac.channel_id = 2 THEN ROUND(1.05 * aci.spend)
          WHEN ac.channel_id = 3 THEN ROUND(1.05 * aci.spend)
    END AS spend_with_tax,
  FROM
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_campaign_insight` aci

  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_campaign` ac
        ON  ac.id = aci.campaign_id
  WHERE date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aci.`date`)) >= '2024-01-01'

),

mkt_spend as(
  SELECT  ci.date_spend, ci.channel_id, ci.product_id, ci.country_id, 
        SUM(ci.spend) as spend, SUM(ci.spend_with_tax) as spend_with_tax,
        case 
          WHEN ci.country_id = 1 THEN 'Thailand'
          WHEN ci.country_id = 2 THEN 'Indo'
          WHEN ci.country_id = 3 THEN 'Việt Nam'
          WHEN ci.country_id = 4 THEN 'Khác'
          WHEN ci.country_id = 5 THEN 'Lào'
          WHEN ci.country_id = 6 THEN 'Malaysia'
          else "Chưa biết"
        end as country,

        case 
              when ci.product_id = 1 then 'Kids - 1 kèm 1'
              when ci.product_id = 2 then 'KEA - 1 kèm 1'
              when ci.product_id = 3 then 'Toán - 1 kèm 1'
              when ci.product_id = 4 then 'Kids - Class'
              when ci.product_id = 5 then 'Tuyển dụng GV'
              when ci.product_id = 6 then 'Khác'
              when ci.product_id = 7 then 'AI Tutor'
              else "Chưa biết"
        end as product_name,

        case 
            when ci.channel_id = 1 then 'Facebook'
            when ci.channel_id = 2 then 'Tiktok'
            when ci.channel_id = 3 then 'Google'
            else "Chưa biết"
        end as channel_name
        -- CASE WHEN ci.line_id is not null then line.name
        --      ELSE 'Line_without_ID'
        -- END as line_mkt
  FROM aff_campaign_inf ci
  -- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_line` line ON(line.id = ci.line_id)
  GROUP BY ci.date_spend, ci.country_id, ci.channel_id, ci.product_id
  ORDER BY date_spend DESC
)



SELECT * 
FROM mkt_spend
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_general_aff_dmkt_trial_cashcollect_other_test_part_view`
AS select * from `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.report_cac_kyna_aff_dmkt_trial_cashcollect_other_test_part_91ba7bf9-c30e-4ed3-98d9-a0dea42a833e`

-- --OLD--
-- with 
-- -- affiliate cost bao gồm cost commission phát sinh cho HV mới Tutoring (1-1, Group, Class) hoặc cost commission phát sinh  khi HV mua lẻ AI Tutor
-- -- có thể chia theo Tutoring hoặc mua lẻ AI Tutor
-- -- có thể chia theo country học viên. Phần affiliate cost cho Tutoring chỉ có trên thị trường VN.
-- affiliate_cost as 
-- (
-- select 
--       afc.*
-- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_affiliate_referral_cost_view` afc

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_general_view`
AS with 
-- new students bao gồm HV mới học Tutoring (từ đơn hoàn thành của booking_order) và HV mới mua lẻ AI Tutor (từ đơn hoàn thành của order)
-- HV mới Tutoring check theo mã KE/student_id rồi tới số phone 
-- HV mới mua lẻ AI Tutor check theo số phone, email
-- Bảng đang làm hiện chỉ group theo ngày hạch toán (có thể group theo cả sản phẩm và quốc gia)
new_students as
(
select 
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', nst.ngay_hach_toan) AS year_month,
      sum(nst.num_new_students_AI_single) as num_new_students_AI_single,
      sum(nst.num_new_students_tutoring) as num_new_students_tutoring,
      sum(nst.total_new_students) as total_new_students
from `kynaforkids.ceo_cac_num_new_students_view` nst
where FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', nst.ngay_hach_toan) <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
group by year_month
),

-- affiliate cost bao gồm cost commission phát sinh cho HV mới Tutoring (1-1, Group, Class) hoặc cost commission phát sinh  khi HV mua lẻ AI Tutor
-- có thể chia theo Tutoring hoặc mua lẻ AI Tutor
-- có thể chia theo country học viên. Phần affiliate cost cho Tutoring chỉ có trên thị trường VN.
affiliate_cost as 
(
select 
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', afc.ngay_hach_toan) AS year_month,
      sum(afc.affiliate_cost) as affiliate_cost,
from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_affiliate_referral_cost_view` afc
where FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', afc.ngay_hach_toan) <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
group by year_month

),

-- digital marketing cost là chi phí có thuế của việc chạy QC mkt trên các kênh QC hàng ngày.
-- có thể chia theo Tutoring (not AI Tutor) hoặc AI Tutor
-- có thể chia theo thị trường chạy QC xem như là country học viên
digital_mkt_cost as
(
select
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', dmkt.date_spend) AS year_month,
      SUM(dmkt.spend_with_tax) as dmkt_cost,

from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_digital_mkt_spending_view` dmkt
where FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', dmkt.date_spend) <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
group by year_month
),

test_cost as
(
select
      ptc.year_month,
      -- ptc.calc_ctv_month_cost as pt_ctv_cost,
      (ptc.calc_month_adjustment + ptc.tester_booking_cost) as pt_tester_cost,
      -- ptc.total_test_cost,
from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_tester_cost_view` ptc
where ptc.year_month <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
),

sale_fixed_cost as (
select 
      sfc1.year_month,
      ROUND(0.6*sfc1.fixedSaleSalary) as fixedSaleSalary,
from `kynaforkids.ceo_cac_sale_fixed_cost_view` sfc1
WHERE sfc1.year_month <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
),

sale_cost as
(
select
      sbc.year_month, 
      sbc.sale_bonus_vnd + sfc.fixedSaleSalary as sale_all_cost

from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_sale_commission_bonus_new_students_view` sbc
left join sale_fixed_cost sfc using(year_month)
),

-- trial_booking_cost_temp as (
-- select      
--             ym.year_month,
--             tbc.teacher_cost_hoc_thu            
-- from `kynaforkids.ceo_cac_trial_booking_cost_view` tbc
-- full join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.cac_year_month_table` ym using(year_month)
-- where ym.year_month <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
-- order by year_month desc
-- ),


-- trial_booking_cost as
-- (
-- select
--       tbc1.year_month,
--       IF(NOT(tbc1.year_month = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())),
--                               tbc1.teacher_cost_hoc_thu,
--                               ROUND(EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE()) / EXTRACT(DAY FROM LAST_DAY(CURRENT_DATE())) * tbc2.teacher_cost_hoc_thu)) as teacher_cost_hoc_thu,   

-- from trial_booking_cost_temp tbc1 
-- LEFT JOIN
--     trial_booking_cost_temp tbc2 
--  ON
--     (CAST(SUBSTRING(tbc1.year_month, 1, 4) AS INT) * 12 + CAST(SUBSTRING(tbc1.year_month, 6, 2) AS INT)) - 1 =
--         (CAST(SUBSTRING(tbc2.year_month, 1, 4) AS INT) * 12 + CAST(SUBSTRING(tbc2.year_month, 6, 2) AS INT))
-- ),

trial_booking_cost as (
select      
            tbc.year_month,
            tbc.teacher_cost_hoc_thu            
from `kynaforkids.ceo_cac_trial_booking_cost_view` tbc
where tbc.year_month <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
order by year_month desc
),

cash_collection_cost as 
(
select
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', ccc.ngay_hach_toan) as year_month,
      sum(ccc.cash_collection_cost) as cash_collection_cost,
      
from `kynaforkids.ceo_cac_cost_thu_ho_cash_collection_view` ccc
where FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', ccc.ngay_hach_toan) <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
group by year_month
),

other_cost as 
(
select
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', oc.ngay_hach_toan) as year_month,
      sum(oc.other_cost) as other_cost,
      
from `kynaforkids.ceo_cac_other_cost_view` oc
where FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', oc.ngay_hach_toan) <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
group by year_month

) 


select 
      nst.*,
      afc.* EXCEPT(year_month),
      dmkt.* EXCEPT(year_month),
      sc.* EXCEPT(year_month),
      ptc.* EXCEPT(year_month),
      tbc.* EXCEPT(year_month),
      ccc.* EXCEPT(year_month),
      oc.* EXCEPT(year_month),
      
      ROUND(afc.affiliate_cost + ptc.pt_tester_cost + dmkt.dmkt_cost + sc.sale_all_cost + tbc.teacher_cost_hoc_thu + ccc.cash_collection_cost + oc.other_cost) as all_cost,
      ROUND((afc.affiliate_cost + ptc.pt_tester_cost + dmkt.dmkt_cost + sc.sale_all_cost + tbc.teacher_cost_hoc_thu + ccc.cash_collection_cost + oc.other_cost)/nst.total_new_students) as cac_general

from  new_students nst 
left join test_cost ptc on (nst.year_month = ptc.year_month)
left join sale_cost sc on (nst.year_month = sc.year_month)
left join digital_mkt_cost dmkt on (dmkt.year_month = nst.year_month)
left join affiliate_cost afc on (afc.year_month = nst.year_month)
left join trial_booking_cost tbc on (nst.year_month = tbc.year_month)
left join cash_collection_cost ccc on (nst.year_month = ccc.year_month)
left join other_cost oc on (nst.year_month = oc.year_month)
order by year_month desc;

-- Optimized SQL Query for Student Analysis
-- Main CTE structure for analyzing new and returning students across tutoring and AI programs

WITH 
-- Base CTE for collecting order information with simplified selection criteria
order_info AS (
  SELECT 
      COALESCE(bo.accounting_date, bo.created_at) AS accounting_date,
      (SELECT created_at
       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
       WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS ngay_tao_lead,
      bo.student_code,
      bo.student_id,
      bo.phone_number,
      bo.id as order_id,
      bo.international_country_id,
      COALESCE(bo.total_video_course, 0) AS total_video_course,
      bo.total,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(CAST(bo.payment_content AS INT64)) AS noi_dung_thanh_toan,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source`(bo.source) AS source,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_program_name_from_id`(bo.program_id) AS program,
      bo.program_type,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_order_status`(bo.status) AS order_status,
      CASE 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 0 THEN 'Chưa duyệt' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 1 THEN 'Đã duyệt' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 2 THEN 'Không duyệt' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 3 THEN 'Cần điều chỉnh' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 4 THEN 'Đã điều chỉnh' 
          ELSE 'Khác' 
      END AS payment_status,
      COALESCE(bo.total, 0) - COALESCE(bo.discount_money, 0) AS price,
      bo.lead_id,
      bo.currency_exchange_rate,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(bo.international_country_id) AS country,
      bo.order_type,
      bo.order_type_sub
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bll 
      ON bll.id = bo.lead_id
  WHERE bo.program_type = 1
    AND bo.order_type = 1
    AND COALESCE(bo.total_video_course, 0) + COALESCE(bo.total, 0) > 0
),

-- Consolidated temp table with dynamic filter conditions based on current month vs previous months
tutoring_orders AS (
  SELECT 
      t1.order_id,
      t1.order_type,
      t1.order_type_sub,
      t1.accounting_date,
      t1.phone_number,
      t1.international_country_id as country_id,
      t1.total_video_course,
      t1.total,
      t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan,
      t1.source,
      t1.program,
      t1.program_type,
      t1.order_status,
      t1.payment_status,
      t1.country,
      t1.student_id,
      t1.student_code,
      -- Count previous orders by same student
      (
        SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bo.order_id) 
        FROM order_info bo 
        WHERE (bo.student_id = t1.student_id OR bo.student_code = t1.student_code) and (t1.student_code is not null or t1.student_id is not null) and (t1.student_code != '') 
          AND bo.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt'  
          AND bo.order_status = 'Hoàn thành' 
          AND bo.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
          AND DATE(bo.accounting_date) < DATE(t1.accounting_date)
      ) as num_completed_orders_same_student,
      -- Count previous orders by same phone number
      (
        SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bo.order_id) 
        FROM order_info bo 
        WHERE RIGHT(bo.phone_number, 9) = RIGHT(t1.phone_number, 9) 
          AND bo.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt' 
          AND bo.order_status = 'Hoàn thành' 
          AND bo.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
          AND DATE(bo.accounting_date) < DATE(t1.accounting_date)
      ) as num_completed_orders_same_phone,
      -- Flag for current month to apply different filtering logic
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE()) AS is_current_month
  FROM order_info t1
  WHERE t1.accounting_date >= '2020-01-01' 
    AND (
        -- Current month conditions (more lenient)
        (FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) >= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', date_sub(CURRENT_DATE(),interval 8 day))
         AND t1.payment_status IN ('Đã duyệt', 'Chưa duyệt', 'Cần điều chỉnh') 
         AND t1.order_status IN ('Hoàn thành', 'Chờ xác nhận thanh toán'))
        OR
        -- Past months conditions (more strict)
        (FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) < FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', date_sub(CURRENT_DATE(),interval 8 day))
         AND t1.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt'
         AND t1.order_status = 'Hoàn thành')
    )
    AND t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
    AND (t1.price + t1.total_video_course) > 0
),

-- Identify whether students are new or returning
student_classification AS (
  SELECT 
      *,
      CASE 
          WHEN NOT(student_id IS NULL AND student_code IS NULL) THEN
              IF(num_completed_orders_same_student > 0, 'Học viên cũ', 'Học viên mới')
          ELSE
              IF(num_completed_orders_same_phone > 0, 'có order cùng phone chưa rõ HV cũ/mới', 'Học viên mới')
      END AS old_new_student
  FROM tutoring_orders
),

-- Aggregate tutoring data by month
tutoring_new_students AS (
  SELECT 
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', accounting_date) AS year_month,
      COUNT(*) AS num_all_students_tutoring,
      COUNTIF(old_new_student = 'Học viên mới') AS num_new_students_tutoring
  FROM student_classification
  GROUP BY year_month
),

ai_single_new_students AS (
select * from `datateam_kynaforkids.ai_new_students_day_D`
)
-- Final result combining tutoring and AI student data
SELECT
    COALESCE(tns.year_month, ais.year_month) AS year_month,
    COALESCE(tns.num_new_students_tutoring, 0) AS num_new_students_tutoring,
    COALESCE(ais.num_new_students_AI_single, 0) AS num_new_students_AI_single,
    COALESCE(tns.num_new_students_tutoring, 0) + COALESCE(ais.num_new_students_AI_single, 0) AS total_new_students,
    COALESCE(tns.num_all_students_tutoring, 0) AS num_all_students_tutoring,
    COALESCE(ais.num_all_students_AI_single, 0) AS num_all_students_AI_single,
    COALESCE(tns.num_all_students_tutoring, 0) + COALESCE(ais.num_all_students_AI_single, 0) AS num_all_students,
    ROUND(
        (COALESCE(tns.num_new_students_tutoring, 0) + COALESCE(ais.num_new_students_AI_single, 0)) / 
        NULLIF((COALESCE(tns.num_all_students_tutoring, 0) + COALESCE(ais.num_all_students_AI_single, 0)), 0),
        4
    ) AS rate_new
FROM tutoring_new_students tns
FULL JOIN ai_single_new_students ais 
    ON tns.year_month = ais.year_month
-- WHERE tns.year_month = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', current_date())
ORDER BY year_month DESC;

;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_num_new_students_weekly_view`
AS WITH 
-- Base CTE for collecting order information with simplified selection criteria
order_info AS (
  SELECT 
      COALESCE(bo.accounting_date, bo.created_at) AS accounting_date,
      (SELECT created_at
       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
       WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS ngay_tao_lead,
      bo.student_code,
      bo.student_id,
      bo.phone_number,
      bo.id as order_id,
      bo.international_country_id,
      COALESCE(bo.total_video_course, 0) AS total_video_course,
      bo.total,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(CAST(bo.payment_content AS INT64)) AS noi_dung_thanh_toan,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source`(bo.source) AS source,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_program_name_from_id`(bo.program_id) AS program,
      bo.program_type,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_order_status`(bo.status) AS order_status,
      CASE 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 0 THEN 'Chưa duyệt' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 1 THEN 'Đã duyệt' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 2 THEN 'Không duyệt' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 3 THEN 'Cần điều chỉnh' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 4 THEN 'Đã điều chỉnh' 
          ELSE 'Khác' 
      END AS payment_status,
      COALESCE(bo.total, 0) - COALESCE(bo.discount_money, 0) AS price,
      bo.lead_id,
      bo.currency_exchange_rate,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(bo.international_country_id) AS country,
      bo.order_type,
      bo.order_type_sub
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bll 
      ON bll.id = bo.lead_id
  WHERE bo.program_type = 1
    AND bo.order_type = 1
    AND COALESCE(bo.total_video_course, 0) + COALESCE(bo.total, 0) > 0
),

-- Consolidated temp table with dynamic filter conditions based on current month vs previous months
tutoring_orders AS (
  SELECT 
      t1.order_id,
      t1.order_type,
      t1.order_type_sub,
      t1.accounting_date,
      t1.phone_number,
      t1.international_country_id as country_id,
      t1.total_video_course,
      t1.total,
      t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan,
      t1.source,
      t1.program,
      t1.program_type,
      t1.order_status,
      t1.payment_status,
      t1.country,
      t1.student_id,
      t1.student_code,
      -- Count previous orders by same student
      (
        SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bo.order_id) 
        FROM order_info bo 
        WHERE (bo.student_id = t1.student_id OR bo.student_code = t1.student_code) and (t1.student_code is not null or t1.student_id is not null) and (t1.student_code != '') 
          AND bo.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt'  
          AND bo.order_status = 'Hoàn thành' 
          AND bo.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
          AND DATE(bo.accounting_date) < DATE(t1.accounting_date)
      ) as num_completed_orders_same_student,
      -- Count previous orders by same phone number
      (
        SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bo.order_id) 
        FROM order_info bo 
        WHERE RIGHT(bo.phone_number, 9) = RIGHT(t1.phone_number, 9) 
          AND bo.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt' 
          AND bo.order_status = 'Hoàn thành' 
          AND bo.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
          AND DATE(bo.accounting_date) < DATE(t1.accounting_date)
      ) as num_completed_orders_same_phone,
      -- Flag for current month to apply different filtering logic
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE()) AS is_current_month
  FROM order_info t1
  WHERE t1.accounting_date >= '2020-01-01' 
    AND (
        -- Current month conditions (more lenient)
        (FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) >= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', date_sub(CURRENT_DATE(),interval 8 day))
         AND t1.payment_status IN ('Đã duyệt', 'Chưa duyệt', 'Cần điều chỉnh') 
         AND t1.order_status IN ('Hoàn thành', 'Chờ xác nhận thanh toán'))
        OR
        -- Past months conditions (more strict)
        (FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) < FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', date_sub(CURRENT_DATE(),interval 8 day))
         AND t1.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt'
         AND t1.order_status = 'Hoàn thành')
    )
    AND t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
    AND (t1.price + t1.total_video_course) > 0
),

-- Identify whether students are new or returning
student_classification AS (
  SELECT 
      *,
      CASE 
          WHEN NOT(student_id IS NULL AND student_code IS NULL) THEN
              IF(num_completed_orders_same_student > 0, 'Học viên cũ', 'Học viên mới')
          ELSE
              IF(num_completed_orders_same_phone > 0, 'có order cùng phone chưa rõ HV cũ/mới', 'Học viên mới')
      END AS old_new_student
  FROM tutoring_orders
),

-- Aggregate tutoring data by month
tutoring_new_students AS (
  SELECT 
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_TRUNC(DATE(accounting_date), WEEK(MONDAY))) AS year_week,
      COUNT(*) AS num_all_students_tutoring,
      COUNTIF(old_new_student = 'Học viên mới') AS num_new_students_tutoring
  FROM student_classification
  GROUP BY year_week
),

-- AI Tutor Single Package Orders
order_ai_tutor_single AS (
  SELECT 
      ord.id AS order_id,
      DATE(IF(ord.completed_at IS NULL, ord.created_at, ord.completed_at)) AS accounting_date,
      ord.country_id,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(ord.country_id) AS country,
      ord.currency_exchange_rate,
      ord.total AS total_oc,
      ori.phone_number AS order_phone_number,
      ori.email AS order_email,
      ord.invoice_code AS order_code,
      ord.status AS order_status_id,
      ord.payment_method_id,
      ord.payment_method_status AS payment_status_id,
      ordd.package_id,
      ordd.package_subscription_id,
      pks.subscription_month,
      pks.name AS subscription_name,
      pks.price AS subscription_price,
      pk.name AS package_name,
      CASE
          WHEN aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_email 
               AND aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_phone 
          THEN 'New Customers'
          ELSE 'Returning Customers'
      END AS customer_type
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_view` ord
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd 
      ON ord.id = ordd.order_id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori 
      ON ord.id = ori.order_id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks 
      ON ordd.package_subscription_id = pks.id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk 
      ON pk.id = ordd.package_id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.Acc_order_video` aov 
      ON ord.id = aov.id
  WHERE (ord.invoice_code LIKE 'KYNA%' OR ord.invoice_code LIKE 'GRAI%')
    AND pk.name LIKE '%AI Tutor%'
    AND ordd.package_combo_id IS NULL
    AND ord.payment_method_status = 2
    AND ord.status = 3
    AND DATE(IF(ord.completed_at IS NULL, ord.created_at, ord.completed_at)) >= '2024-08-01'
),

-- AI Tutor Combo Package Orders
order_ai_tutor_combo AS (
  SELECT 
      ord.id AS order_id,
      DATE(IF(ord.completed_at IS NULL, ord.created_at, ord.completed_at)) AS accounting_date,
      ord.country_id,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(ord.country_id) AS country,
      ord.currency_exchange_rate,
      ord.total AS total_oc,
      ori.phone_number AS order_phone_number,
      ori.email AS order_email,
      ord.invoice_code AS order_code,
      ord.status AS order_status_id,
      ord.payment_method_id,
      ord.payment_method_status AS payment_status_id,
      ordd.package_id,
      ordd.package_subscription_id,
      pks.subscription_month,
      pks.name AS subscription_name,
      pks.price AS subscription_price,
      pk.name AS package_name,
      CASE
          WHEN aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_email 
               AND aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_phone 
          THEN 'New Customers'
          ELSE 'Returning Customers'
      END AS customer_type
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_view` ord
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd 
      ON ord.id = ordd.order_id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori 
      ON ord.id = ori.order_id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` pcs 
      ON ordd.package_subscription_id = pcs.id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks 
      ON pcs.package_subscription_id = pks.id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk 
      ON pk.id = pcs.package_id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.Acc_order_video` aov 
      ON ord.id = aov.id
  WHERE (ord.invoice_code LIKE 'KYNA%' OR ord.invoice_code LIKE 'GRAI%')
    AND pk.name LIKE '%AI%'
    AND ordd.package_combo_id IS NOT NULL
    AND ord.payment_method_status = 2
    AND ord.status = 3
    AND DATE(IF(ord.completed_at IS NULL, ord.created_at, ord.completed_at)) >= '2024-08-01'
),

-- Combine single and combo AI tutor orders
ai_students AS (
  SELECT * FROM order_ai_tutor_single
  UNION ALL
  SELECT * FROM order_ai_tutor_combo
),

-- Aggregate AI data by month
ai_single_new_students AS (
  SELECT 
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m-%d', DATE_TRUNC(DATE(accounting_date), WEEK(MONDAY))) AS year_week,
      COUNT(DISTINCT IF(customer_type = 'New Customers', order_id, NULL)) AS num_new_students_AI_single,
      COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) AS num_all_students_AI_single
  FROM ai_students
  GROUP BY year_week
)

-- Final result combining tutoring and AI student data
SELECT
    COALESCE(tns.year_week, ais.year_week) AS year_week,
    COALESCE(tns.num_new_students_tutoring, 0) AS num_new_students_tutoring,
    COALESCE(ais.num_new_students_AI_single, 0) AS num_new_students_AI_single,
    COALESCE(tns.num_new_students_tutoring, 0) + COALESCE(ais.num_new_students_AI_single, 0) AS total_new_students,
    COALESCE(tns.num_all_students_tutoring, 0) AS num_all_students_tutoring,
    COALESCE(ais.num_all_students_AI_single, 0) AS num_all_students_AI_single,
    COALESCE(tns.num_all_students_tutoring, 0) + COALESCE(ais.num_all_students_AI_single, 0) AS num_all_students,
    ROUND(
        (COALESCE(tns.num_new_students_tutoring, 0) + COALESCE(ais.num_new_students_AI_single, 0)) / 
        NULLIF((COALESCE(tns.num_all_students_tutoring, 0) + COALESCE(ais.num_all_students_AI_single, 0)), 0),
        4
    ) AS rate_new
FROM tutoring_new_students tns
FULL JOIN ai_single_new_students ais 
    ON tns.year_week = ais.year_week
-- WHERE tns.year_week = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', current_date())
ORDER BY year_week DESC;

;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_other_cost_view`
AS WITH order_info AS (
(SELECT date(bo.created_at) AS ngay_tao_don,
          date(bo.payment_at) AS ngay_duyet_don,
          if(bo.accounting_date IS NULL, bo.created_at, bo.accounting_date) AS accounting_date,

     (SELECT created_at
      FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
      WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS ngay_tao_lead,
          bo.invoice_code,

          bo.student_code,
          bo.student_id,
          bo.phone_number,
          bo.id as order_id,
          bo.international_country_id,
          if(bo.total_video_course IS NULL, 0, bo.total_video_course) AS total_video_course,
          bo.total,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source`(bo.source) AS source,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_program_name_from_id`(bo.program_id) AS program,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_order_status`(bo.status) AS order_status,
          bo.total - if(bo.discount_money IS NULL, 0, bo.discount_money) AS price,
          bo.lead_id AS lead_id,

     
     IF (bll.actual_utm_campaign IS NULL,
                                   bll.utm_campaign,
                                   bll.actual_utm_campaign) AS affiliate_campaign,
  
          bo.currency_exchange_rate,
          ((bo.total - if(bo.discount_money IS NULL, 0, bo.discount_money)) * bo.currency_exchange_rate) AS price_vnd,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(bo.international_country_id) AS country,
    
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bll ON bll.id = bo.lead_id
where bo.payment_status in (1) 
         and bo.order_type not in (3)
         and bo.program_type in (1)
   )
),

tutoring_order_value as 
(
  select
        FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', oi.accounting_date) as year_month,
        round(sum((oi.price + oi.total_video_course) * oi.currency_exchange_rate)) as total_tutoring_order_value,
  from order_info oi
  group by year_month
  order by year_month desc


),

ai_order_value as
(
SELECT 
        FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', aov.completed_at) as year_month,
        ROUND(SUM(aov.currency_exchange_rate * aov.total_oc)) as total_ai_single_order_value
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_order_video_view` aov
WHERE 
        aov.payment_status_id in (2) and aov.Mon_hoc like "%AI Tutor%"
        and aov.status in ('Hoàn thành')
GROUP BY year_month
ORDER BY year_month DESC
)

SELECT
      coalesce(tns.year_month,ais.year_month) as year_month,
      if(tns.total_tutoring_order_value is null, 0, tns.total_tutoring_order_value) as total_tutoring_order_value,
      if(ais.total_ai_single_order_value is null, 0, ais.total_ai_single_order_value) as total_ai_single_order_value,
      ROUND(if(tns.total_tutoring_order_value is null, 0, tns.total_tutoring_order_value)  + if(ais.total_ai_single_order_value is null, 0, ais.total_ai_single_order_value)) as total_order_value,
      ROUND(0.0012*(if(tns.total_tutoring_order_value is null, 0, tns.total_tutoring_order_value)  + if(ais.total_ai_single_order_value is null, 0, ais.total_ai_single_order_value))) as other_cost,
      ROUND(0.012*(if(tns.total_tutoring_order_value is null, 0, tns.total_tutoring_order_value)  + if(ais.total_ai_single_order_value is null, 0, ais.total_ai_single_order_value))) as cash_collection_cost


FROM tutoring_order_value tns
FULL JOIN ai_order_value ais ON(tns.year_month = ais.year_month)
where coalesce(tns.year_month,ais.year_month) >= '2024-01'
ORDER BY year_month DESC




;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_other_cost_view_2`
AS WITH 
tutoring_students AS 
(
WITH order_info AS (
  (SELECT date(bo.created_at) AS ngay_tao_don,
          date(bo.payment_at) AS ngay_duyet_don,
          if(bo.accounting_date IS NULL, date(bo.created_at), bo.accounting_date) AS accounting_date,

     (SELECT created_at
      FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
      WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS ngay_tao_lead,
          bo.invoice_code,

     -- (SELECT name
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
     --  WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS ten_phu_huynh,
          -- bo.email,
          -- bo.name,
          bo.student_code,
          bo.student_id,
          bo.phone_number,
          bo.id as order_id,
          bo.international_country_id,
          if(bo.total_video_course IS NULL, 0, bo.total_video_course) AS total_video_course,
          bo.total,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(cast(bo.payment_content AS INT64)) AS noi_dung_thanh_toan,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source`(bo.source) AS source,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_program_name_from_id`(bo.program_id) AS program,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_order_status`(bo.status) AS order_status,
          CASE WHEN bo.payment_status = 0 THEN 'Chưa duyệt' 
               WHEN bo.payment_status = 1 THEN 'Đã duyệt' 
               WHEN bo.payment_status = 2 THEN 'Không duyệt' 
               WHEN bo.payment_status = 3 THEN 'Cần điều chỉnh' 
               WHEN bo.payment_status = 4 THEN 'Đã điều chỉnh' 
               ELSE 'Khác' END AS payment_status,
          bo.total - if(bo.discount_money IS NULL, 0, bo.discount_money) AS price,
          -- bo.duration,
          -- bo.note AS note,
          bo.lead_id AS lead_id,
          -- bll.gclid,

     -- (SELECT sale_id
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
     --  WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS sale_id,
     
     IF (bll.actual_utm_campaign IS NULL,
                                   bll.utm_campaign,
                                   bll.actual_utm_campaign) AS affiliate_campaign,
    --  bll.actual_utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign, 
    --  (SELECT actual_lead_id
    --   FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
    --   WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS actual_lead_id,
    --       if(bll.actual_lead_id IS NULL, bll.utm_campaign,
    --            (SELECT bl.utm_campaign
    --             FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl
    --             WHERE bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) AS affiliate_campaign,

     -- (SELECT fanpage_name
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
     --  WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS fanpage_name,
          -- if(bll.actual_lead_id IS NULL, bll.landing_page_name,
          --      (SELECT bl.landing_page_name
          --       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl
          --       WHERE bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) AS landingpage_name,
          -- if(bll.actual_lead_id IS NULL, bll.affiliate_id,
          --      (SELECT bl.affiliate_id
          --       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl
          --       WHERE bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) AS affiliate_id,
          bo.currency_exchange_rate,
          ((bo.total - if(bo.discount_money IS NULL, 0, bo.discount_money)) * bo.currency_exchange_rate) AS price_vnd,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(bo.international_country_id) AS country,
          -- bo.total_lesson,

     -- (SELECT string_agg(t1.video_course_name)
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.view_tutoring_video_course_name` t1
     --  WHERE t1.id = bo.id) AS video_course_name,
          -- if(bll.actual_lead_id IS NULL,
          --      (SELECT max(u.email)
          --       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.kynaforkids_user` u
          --       WHERE bll.affiliate_id = u.id),
          --      (SELECT max(u.email)
          --       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.kynaforkids_user` u
          --       WHERE bll.actual_lead_id = bl.id
          --         AND bl.affiliate_id = u.id)) AS affiliate_email,

     -- (SELECT max(u.email)
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.kynaforkids_user` u,
     --       `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au
     --  WHERE au.affiliate_id = bo.affiliate_id
     --    AND au.user_id = u.id) AS affiliate_emaill,

     -- (SELECT ac.name
     --  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
     --       `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au
     --  WHERE bo.affiliate_id = au.affiliate_id
     --    AND au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) AS loai_affiliate,
          -- IF (bll.actual_lead_id IS NULL,
          --       (SELECT ac.name
          --        FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
          --             `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac
          --        WHERE bll.affiliate_id = au.user_id
          --          AND au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id),
          --       (SELECT ac.name
          --        FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl,
          --             `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
          --             `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac
          --        WHERE bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id
          --          AND bl.affiliate_id = au.user_id
          --          AND au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id)) AS affiliate_type
   FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
   LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bll ON bll.id = bo.lead_id

--    WHERE DATE(bo.created_at) >= '2024-08-01' 
   )
),

temp_table as
(
SELECT 
       t1.order_id,
       t1.ngay_tao_don,
       t1.ngay_duyet_don,
       t1.accounting_date,
       t1.ngay_tao_lead,
       t1.invoice_code,
     --   t1.ten_phu_huynh,
     --   t1.email,
     --   t1.name,
     --   t1.student_code,
       t1.phone_number,
       t1.international_country_id as country_id,
       t1.total_video_course,
       t1.total,
       t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan,
       t1.source,
       t1.program,
       t1.order_status,
       t1.payment_status,
     --   t1.price,
       ((t1.price + t1.total_video_course) * t1.currency_exchange_rate) AS total_VND,
     --   (t1.price + t1.total_video_course) AS total_nguyen_te,
     --   t1.duration,
     --   t1.note,
       t1.lead_id,
     --   `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_email_from_kynaforkids_user`(t1.sale_id) AS sale_email,
       t1.affiliate_campaign,
     --   t1.landingpage_name,
     --   t1.fanpage_name,
     --   t1.gclid,
     --   t1.affiliate_id,
     --   t1.affiliate_email,
     --   t1.affiliate_type,
     --   t1.currency_exchange_rate,
     --   t1.price_vnd,
       t1.country,
     --   t1.total_lesson,
     --   t1.video_course_name,
     --   t1.affiliate_emaill,
     --   t1.loai_affiliate
      t1.student_id,
      t1.student_code,
      (
         SELECT COUNT(distinct bo.id) 
         FROM `kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo 
         WHERE (bo.student_id = t1.student_id OR bo.student_code = t1.student_code) AND bo.payment_status in (0,1,3) AND bo.status in (4,6) AND `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(cast(bo.payment_content AS INT64)) in ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') AND date(bo.accounting_date) <= date(t1.accounting_date)
      ) as num_completed_orders_same_student, 

        (
         SELECT COUNT(distinct bo.id) 
         FROM `kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo 
         WHERE (RIGHT(bo.phone_number,9) = RIGHT(t1.phone_number,9)) AND bo.payment_status in (0,1,3) AND bo.status in (4,6) AND `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(cast(bo.payment_content AS INT64)) in ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') AND date(bo.accounting_date) <= date(t1.accounting_date)
      ) as num_completed_orders_same_phone,

FROM order_info t1
WHERE 
      -- t1.source = 'Marketing'  
      t1.accounting_date >= '2024-01-01' 
      AND t1.payment_status in ('Đã duyệt','Chưa duyệt','Cần điều chỉnh') 
      AND t1.order_status in ('Hoàn thành', 'Chờ xác nhận thanh toán')
      AND t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan in ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
      AND (t1.price + t1.total_video_course) > 0
      -- AND t1.ngay_tao_lead >= '2024-01-01'
)

SELECT 
        date(accounting_date) as ngay_hach_toan,
        -- country_id,
        SUM(total_VND) as total_tutoring_order_value,
FROM
(SELECT 
       accounting_date,total_VND,
       if(not(student_id is null AND student_code is null),if(t2.num_completed_orders_same_student > 1, 'Học viên cũ', 'Học viên mới'),if(t2.num_completed_orders_same_phone > 1, 'có order cùng phone chưa rõ HV cũ/mới', 'Học viên mới')) as old_new_student,
       

FROM temp_table t2
-- WHERE not(student_id is null AND student_code is null)
)
-- WHERE old_new_student = 'Học viên mới'
GROUP BY ngay_hach_toan --, country_id -- có thể group theo cả country nữa
ORDER BY ngay_hach_toan desc
),

ai_single_students AS 
(
WITH 
order_ai_tutor_single AS
(SELECT 
        --ord.*,
        ord.id as order_id,
        date(timestamp_seconds(ord.created_at)) as created_at,
      --   date(ord.updated_at) as updated_at,
        date(timestamp_seconds(ord.completed_at)) as completed_at,
      --   ord.created_by,
      --   ord.telesale_id,
        ord.register_source,        
        ord.country_id,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(ord.country_id) as country,
        ord.currency_exchange_rate,
        ord.total as total_oc,
        
        
       -- ord.user_id,
        ori.phone_number as order_phone_number,
        ori.email as order_email,
        ori.lead_id,
      --   if((ori.phone_number) in (SELECT * FROM users_1_1_phone_number),"Đã học 1-1","Chưa học 1-1") as check_1_1, 

        

        ord.invoice_code as order_code,
        ord.status as order_status_id,
        ord.payment_method_id,
        ord.payment_method_status as payment_status_id,
        ord.affiliate_id,
        (SELECT email FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user us WHERE ord.affiliate_id = us.id) as affiliate_email,
        (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user au WHERE au.user_id = ord.affiliate_id) as affiliate_category_id,
        ord.utm_campaign,


        ordd.package_id,
        ordd.package_subscription_id,
        pks.subscription_month,
        pks.name as subscription_name,
        pks.price as subscription_price,
        pk.name as package_name,

        
       
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` ord
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd ON (ord.id = ordd.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori ON (ord.id = ori.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks ON (ordd.package_subscription_id = pks.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = ordd.package_id)



WHERE 
      ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%'
      AND pk.name like '%AI Tutor%'
      AND ordd.package_combo_id is null
),

order_ai_tutor_combo AS
(SELECT 
        --ord.*,
        ord.id as order_id,
        date(timestamp_seconds(ord.created_at)) as created_at,
      --   date(ord.updated_at) as updated_at,
        date(timestamp_seconds(ord.completed_at)) as completed_at,
      --   ord.created_by,
      --   ord.telesale_id,
        ord.register_source,        
        ord.country_id,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(ord.country_id) as country,
        ord.currency_exchange_rate,
        ord.total as total_oc,
        
        
       -- ord.user_id,
        ori.phone_number as order_phone_number,
        ori.email as order_email,
        ori.lead_id,
      --   if((ori.phone_number) in (SELECT * FROM users_1_1_phone_number),"Đã học 1-1","Chưa học 1-1") as check_1_1, 


        -- ord.invoice_code as order_code,
        -- ord.status as order_status_id,
        -- case when ord.status = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
        --      when ord.status = 2 then 'Đã xác nhận'
        --      when ord.status = 3 then 'Hoàn thành'
        --      when ord.status = 4 then 'Hủy'
        --      when ord.status = 5 then 'Đã hoàn tiền'   
        -- end as order_status,

        -- ord.payment_method_id,
        -- ord.payment_method_status,
        
        -- ord.affiliate_id,  
        -- ord.affiliate_email,
        -- ord.affiliate_category_name,
        

        ord.invoice_code as order_code,
        ord.status as order_status_id,
        ord.payment_method_id,
        ord.payment_method_status as payment_status_id,
        ord.affiliate_id,
        (SELECT email FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user us WHERE ord.affiliate_id = us.id) as affiliate_email,
        (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user au WHERE au.user_id = ord.affiliate_id) as affiliate_category_id,
        ord.utm_campaign,


        ordd.package_id,
        ordd.package_subscription_id,
        pks.subscription_month,
        pks.name as subscription_name,
        pks.price as subscription_price,
        pk.name as package_name,


        
       
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` ord
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd ON (ord.id = ordd.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori ON (ord.id = ori.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` pcs ON (ordd.package_subscription_id = pcs.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks ON (pcs.package_subscription_id = pks.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = pcs.package_id)
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = ordd.package_combo_id)


WHERE 
      ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%'
      AND pk.name like '%AI%'
      AND ordd.package_combo_id is not null
),

order_ai_tutor AS
(
SELECT country_id,order_id,payment_status_id,order_status_id,lead_id,total_oc,currency_exchange_rate,affiliate_category_id,completed_at,created_at FROM order_ai_tutor_single

UNION ALL

SELECT country_id,order_id,payment_status_id,order_status_id,lead_id,total_oc,currency_exchange_rate,affiliate_category_id,completed_at,created_at  FROM order_ai_tutor_combo

),

temp_table as 
(

SELECT 
      country_id,order_id,payment_status_id,order_status_id,lead_id,total_oc,currency_exchange_rate,
      (SELECT ac.name FROM `kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac WHERE ac.id = oat.affiliate_category_id) AS affiliate_category_name,
      if(oat.completed_at is null, oat.created_at, oat.completed_at) as created_at,
FROM order_ai_tutor oat
),

single_ai_order as (
SELECT   
         tt.created_at as ngay_hach_toan,
        (select blv.affiliate_campaign from `kynaforkids.mkt_booking_lead_view` blv
         where blv.id = tt.lead_id) as utm_campaign,
         tt.country_id,
         tt.lead_id,

         tt.total_oc,
         tt.currency_exchange_rate,

        --  tt.total_oc * tt.currency_exchange_rate as total_VND,
         tt.order_id,
         case 
              when tt.country_id = 3 then 1
              when tt.country_id = 1 then 
                  (SELECT ce.rate FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.currency_exchange_config` ce 
                    WHERE ce.from = 'THB' and ce.to = 'VND' and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_start)) <= tt.created_at and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_end)) >= tt.created_at)
              when tt.country_id = 2 then 
                  (SELECT ce.rate FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.currency_exchange_config` ce 
                    WHERE ce.from = 'IDR' and ce.to = 'VND' and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_start)) <= tt.created_at and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_end)) >= tt.created_at)
               when tt.country_id = 5 then 
                  (SELECT ce.rate FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.currency_exchange_config` ce 
                    WHERE ce.from = 'KIP' and ce.to = 'VND' and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_start)) <= tt.created_at and date(timestamp_seconds(ce.date_end)) >= tt.created_at)      
         else null
     end as ty_gia,

      case
              when aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_phone then 'New Customers'
              else 'Returning Customers'
      end as type_order_phone,
      case
              when aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_email then 'New Customers'
              else 'Returning Customers'
      end as type_order_email
FROM temp_table tt
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.Acc_order_video` aov ON (tt.order_id = aov.id)

WHERE 
      tt.created_at >= '2024-08-01' --and tt.created_at <= '2024-10-31'
      and tt.payment_status_id in (2,4,5,6)
      and tt.order_status_id in (2,3)
)

SELECT 
      sao.ngay_hach_toan,
      -- sao.country_id,
      -- COUNT(distinct sao.order_id) as num_new_students_AI_single,
      SUM(sao.ty_gia * sao.total_oc) as total_ai_single_order_value

FROM single_ai_order sao
-- WHERE sao.type_order_email = 'New Customers' and sao.type_order_phone = 'New Customers' 
GROUP BY sao.ngay_hach_toan --, sao.country_id       -- có thể group theo country nữa
ORDER BY sao.ngay_hach_toan DESC
)


SELECT
      if(tns.ngay_hach_toan is null, ais.ngay_hach_toan, tns.ngay_hach_toan) as ngay_hach_toan,
      ROUND(0.0012*(if(tns.total_tutoring_order_value is null, 0, tns.total_tutoring_order_value)  + if(ais.total_ai_single_order_value is null, 0, ais.total_ai_single_order_value))) as other_cost

FROM tutoring_students tns
FULL JOIN ai_single_students ais ON(tns.ngay_hach_toan = ais.ngay_hach_toan)  -- có thể group theo ngay hạch toán và cả country, hiện chưa làm tới mức country
ORDER BY ngay_hach_toan DESC



;

-- -- Base CTE for order information with standardized formatting and reduced redundancy

-- ),

-- -- Combining previous completed orders for student and phone tracking
-- -- This replaces two separate subqueries with a single pre-computed lookup table
-- previous_orders AS (
--   SELECT
--     bo.student_id,
--     bo.student_code,
--     RIGHT(bo.phone_number, 9) AS phone_number_suffix,
--     bo.accounting_date,

--   WHERE bo.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt'
