--     AND bo.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau')
--   GROUP BY bo.student_id, bo.student_code, RIGHT(bo.phone_number, 9), bo.accounting_date
-- ),

-- -- Combined logic for both current and past months with a filter flag
-- combined_orders AS (
--   SELECT
--     t1.order_id,
--     t1.order_type,
--     t1.order_type_sub,
--     t1.accounting_date,
--     t1.phone_number,
--     t1.international_country_id AS country_id,
--     t1.total_video_course,
--     t1.total,
--     t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan,
--     t1.source,
--     t1.program,
--     t1.program_type,
--     t1.order_status,
--     t1.payment_status,
--     t1.country,
--     t1.student_id,
--     t1.student_code,
--     t1.price,
--     FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE()) AS is_current_month,
--     (
--       SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT po.num_orders)
--       FROM previous_orders po
--       WHERE (po.student_id = t1.student_id OR po.student_code = t1.student_code)
--         AND DATE(po.accounting_date) < DATE(t1.accounting_date)
--     ) AS num_completed_orders_same_student,
--     (
--       SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT po.num_orders)
--       FROM previous_orders po
--       WHERE po.phone_number_suffix = RIGHT(t1.phone_number, 9)
--         AND DATE(po.accounting_date) < DATE(t1.accounting_date)
--     ) AS num_completed_orders_same_phone
--   FROM order_info t1
--   WHERE t1.accounting_date >= '2024-01-01'
--     AND t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau')
--     AND (t1.price + t1.total_video_course) > 0
--     AND (
--       -- Current month conditions
--       (
--         FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
--         AND t1.payment_status IN ('Đã duyệt', 'Chưa duyệt', 'Cần điều chỉnh','Đã điều chỉnh')
--         AND t1.order_status IN ('Hoàn thành', 'Chờ xác nhận thanh toán')
--       )
--       -- Past month conditions
--       OR (
--         FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) < FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
--         AND t1.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt'
--         AND t1.order_status = 'Hoàn thành'
--       )
--     )
-- ),

-- -- Student classification with simplified logic
-- student_classification AS (
--   SELECT
--     co.*,
--     CASE
--       WHEN co.student_id IS NOT NULL OR (co.student_code IS NOT NULL AND trim(co.student_code) != '') THEN
--         CASE WHEN co.num_completed_orders_same_student > 0 THEN 'Học viên cũ' ELSE 'Học viên mới' END
--       ELSE
--         CASE WHEN co.num_completed_orders_same_phone > 0 THEN 'có order cùng phone chưa rõ HV cũ/mới' ELSE 'Học viên mới' END
--     END AS old_new_student
--   FROM combined_orders co
-- ),

WITH

order_info AS (
  SELECT 
      COALESCE(bo.accounting_date, bo.created_at) AS accounting_date,
      (SELECT created_at
       FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead`
       WHERE id = bo.lead_id) AS ngay_tao_lead,
      bo.student_code,
      bo.student_id,
      bo.phone_number,
      bo.id as order_id,
      bo.international_country_id,
      COALESCE(bo.total_video_course, 0) AS total_video_course,
      bo.total,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(CAST(bo.payment_content AS INT64)) AS noi_dung_thanh_toan,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source`(bo.source) AS source,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_program_name_from_id`(bo.program_id) AS program,
      bo.program_type,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_order_status`(bo.status) AS order_status,
      CASE 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 0 THEN 'Chưa duyệt' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 1 THEN 'Đã duyệt' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 2 THEN 'Không duyệt' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 3 THEN 'Cần điều chỉnh' 
          WHEN bo.payment_status = 4 THEN 'Đã điều chỉnh' 
          ELSE 'Khác' 
      END AS payment_status,
      COALESCE(bo.total, 0) - COALESCE(bo.discount_money, 0) AS price,
      bo.lead_id,
      bo.currency_exchange_rate,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(bo.international_country_id) AS country,
      bo.order_type,
      bo.order_type_sub
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bll 
      ON bll.id = bo.lead_id
  WHERE bo.program_type = 1
    AND bo.order_type = 1
    AND COALESCE(bo.total_video_course, 0) + COALESCE(bo.total, 0) > 0
),

-- Consolidated temp table with dynamic filter conditions based on current month vs previous months
tutoring_orders AS (
  SELECT 
      t1.order_id,
      t1.order_type,
      t1.order_type_sub,
      t1.accounting_date,
      t1.phone_number,
      t1.international_country_id as country_id,
      t1.total_video_course,
      t1.total,
      t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan,
      t1.source,
      t1.program,
      t1.program_type,
      t1.order_status,
      t1.payment_status,
      t1.country,
      t1.student_id,
      t1.student_code,
      -- Count previous orders by same student
      (
        SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bo.order_id) 
        FROM order_info bo 
        WHERE (bo.student_id = t1.student_id OR bo.student_code = t1.student_code) and (t1.student_code is not null or t1.student_id is not null) and (t1.student_code != '') 
          AND bo.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt'  
          AND bo.order_status = 'Hoàn thành' 
          AND bo.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
          AND DATE(bo.accounting_date) < DATE(t1.accounting_date)
      ) as num_completed_orders_same_student,
      -- Count previous orders by same phone number
      (
        SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT bo.order_id) 
        FROM order_info bo 
        WHERE RIGHT(bo.phone_number, 9) = RIGHT(t1.phone_number, 9) 
          AND bo.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt' 
          AND bo.order_status = 'Hoàn thành' 
          AND bo.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
          AND DATE(bo.accounting_date) < DATE(t1.accounting_date)
      ) as num_completed_orders_same_phone,
      -- Flag for current month to apply different filtering logic
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) = FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE()) AS is_current_month
  FROM order_info t1
  WHERE t1.accounting_date >= '2020-01-01' 
    AND (
        -- Current month conditions (more lenient)
        (FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) >= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', date_sub(CURRENT_DATE(),interval 8 day))
         AND t1.payment_status IN ('Đã duyệt', 'Chưa duyệt', 'Cần điều chỉnh', 'Đã điều chỉnh') 
         AND t1.order_status IN ('Hoàn thành', 'Chờ xác nhận thanh toán'))
        OR
        -- Past months conditions (more strict)
        (FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.accounting_date) < FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', date_sub(CURRENT_DATE(),interval 8 day))
         AND t1.payment_status = 'Đã duyệt'
         AND t1.order_status = 'Hoàn thành')
    )
    AND t1.noi_dung_thanh_toan IN ('Ghi danh lần đầu', 'Ghi danh lại', 'Trả góp lần sau') 
    AND (t1.price + t1.total_video_course) > 0
),

-- Identify whether students are new or returning
student_classification AS (
  SELECT 
      *,
      CASE 
          WHEN NOT(student_id IS NULL AND (student_code IS NULL OR trim(student_code) = '')) THEN
              IF(num_completed_orders_same_student > 0, 'Học viên cũ', 'Học viên mới')
          ELSE
              IF(num_completed_orders_same_phone > 0, 'có order cùng phone chưa rõ HV cũ/mới', 'Học viên mới')
      END AS old_new_student
  FROM tutoring_orders
),

-- Sale commission calculation for new students
sale_commission_data AS (
  SELECT
    sc.accounting_date AS ngay_hach_toan,
    bo.currency_exchange_rate AS ty_gia,
    bsc.amount AS thu_nhap
  FROM student_classification sc
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_sale_commission` bsc ON sc.order_id = bsc.order_id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo ON sc.order_id = bo.id
  WHERE sc.old_new_student = 'Học viên mới'
),

-- VND conversion for sale tutoring bonus
tutoring_bonus_calculation AS (
  SELECT
    FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', ngay_hach_toan) AS year_month,
    ty_gia * thu_nhap AS sale_tutoring_bonus_vnd
  FROM sale_commission_data
  WHERE ty_gia * thu_nhap < 20000000
),

-- Aggregated tutoring bonus by month
sale_tutoring_bonus AS (
  SELECT
    year_month,
    ROUND(SUM(sale_tutoring_bonus_vnd)) AS sale_tutoring_bonus_vnd
  FROM tutoring_bonus_calculation
  WHERE year_month >= '2024-01'
  GROUP BY year_month
),

-- AI Tutor order processing with simplified joins
order_ai_tutor AS (
  SELECT
    ord.id AS order_id,
    COALESCE(DATE(ord.completed_at), DATE(ord.created_at)) AS accounting_date,
    ord.currency_exchange_rate,
    ordd.unit_price,
    ord.sub_total,
    COALESCE(ord.discount_amount, 0) AS discount_amount,
    COALESCE(ordd.voucher_discount_amount, 0) AS voucher_discount_amount,
    COALESCE(ord.shipping_fee, 0) AS shipping_fee
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_view` ord
  JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd ON ord.id = ordd.order_id
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` pcs 
    ON ordd.package_subscription_id = pcs.id AND ordd.package_combo_id IS NOT NULL
  JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks
    ON COALESCE(pcs.package_subscription_id, ordd.package_subscription_id) = pks.id
  JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk
    ON COALESCE(pcs.package_id, ordd.package_id) = pk.id
  WHERE ord.payment_method_status = 2
    AND ord.status = 3
    AND (ord.invoice_code LIKE 'KYNA%' OR ord.invoice_code LIKE 'GRAI%')
    AND (
      (ordd.package_combo_id IS NULL AND pk.name LIKE '%AI Tutor%')
      OR (ordd.package_combo_id IS NOT NULL AND pk.name LIKE '%AI%')
    )
),

-- New customer identification with simplified logic
new_customers AS (
  SELECT
    oat.order_id,
    MIN(oat.accounting_date) AS accounting_date,
    MIN(oat.currency_exchange_rate) AS currency_exchange_rate,
    CASE 
      WHEN MIN(oat.sub_total) != 0 THEN 
        (MIN(oat.unit_price) + (MIN(oat.unit_price)/MIN(oat.sub_total)) * 
         (MIN(oat.shipping_fee) - (MIN(oat.discount_amount) + MIN(oat.voucher_discount_amount))))
      ELSE 0
    END AS total_oc,
    CASE
      WHEN MIN(oat.accounting_date) = DATE(MIN(aov.first_time_purchase_phone)) AND 
           MIN(oat.accounting_date) = DATE(MIN(aov.first_time_purchase_email))
      THEN 'New Customer'
      ELSE 'Returning Customer'
    END AS customer_type
  FROM order_ai_tutor oat
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.Acc_order_video_view` aov ON oat.order_id = aov.id
  WHERE oat.accounting_date >= '2024-01-01'
  GROUP BY order_id
),

-- AI tutor commission calculation
sale_ai_bonus AS (
  SELECT
    FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', accounting_date) AS year_month,
    ROUND(SUM(total_oc * currency_exchange_rate) * 0.08) AS sale_ai_tutor_commission_vnd
  FROM new_customers
  WHERE customer_type = 'New Customer'
  GROUP BY year_month
)

-- sale_ai_bonus AS (
-- select * from `datateam_kynaforkids.sale_ai_bonus_day_D`
-- )

-- Final result combining both commission types
SELECT 
  stb.year_month,
  stb.sale_tutoring_bonus_vnd,
  sab.sale_ai_tutor_commission_vnd,
  stb.sale_tutoring_bonus_vnd + COALESCE(sab.sale_ai_tutor_commission_vnd, 0) AS sale_bonus_vnd
FROM sale_tutoring_bonus stb
LEFT JOIN sale_ai_bonus sab USING(year_month)
ORDER BY stb.year_month DESC;;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_sale_fixed_cost_view`
AS WITH sale_fixed_cost_temp AS (
  SELECT      
    ym.year_month,
    sfc.fixedSaleSalary,
    IF(sfc.fixedSaleSalary IS NOT NULL, 1, 0) AS is_salary_finalized
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.cac_year_month_table` ym
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.CEO_CAC_fixedSaleSalary_month` sfc USING(year_month)
  WHERE year_month BETWEEN '2024-01' AND FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE())
  ORDER BY year_month DESC
),

most_recent_salary AS (
  SELECT fixedSaleSalary
  FROM sale_fixed_cost_temp
  WHERE is_salary_finalized = 1
  ORDER BY year_month DESC
  LIMIT 1
)

SELECT 
  t.year_month,
  CASE
    WHEN t.is_salary_finalized = 1 THEN t.fixedSaleSalary
    ELSE ROUND((SELECT fixedSaleSalary FROM most_recent_salary) * 
         IF(t.year_month < FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE()),
            1,
            (EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE()) / EXTRACT(DAY FROM LAST_DAY(CURRENT_DATE())))))
  END AS fixedSaleSalary
FROM sale_fixed_cost_temp t
WHERE t.year_month >= '2024-01'
ORDER BY t.year_month DESC;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_tester_cost_view`
AS with tester_booking_cost_data as
(
select 

  -- t1.booking_id,
  t1.booking_time,
  -- t1.booking_type,
  -- t1.num_shift,
  -- t1.teacher_name,
  t1.teacher_country,
  -- t1.booking_status,
  t1.program,
  -- t1.teacher_id,
  -- t1.payment_content,
  -- t1.teacher_source,
  t1.student_country,
  -- if(sum(t1.revenue) is null,0,sum(t1.revenue)) as revenue_oc,
  -- if(sum(t1.revenue) is null,0,(sum(t1.revenue) * if(avg(t1.currency_exchange_rate) is null, 1, avg(t1.currency_exchange_rate)))) as revenue_vnd,
  max(s2.sellingEx) as sellingEx,
  if(max(t1.income) is null, 0,max(t1.income))  + if(max(t1.bonus_income) is null, 0, max(t1.bonus_income))
  + if(max(bsi.bonus_test_online_early_review) is null, 0, max(bsi.bonus_test_online_early_review))
  + if(max(bsi.bonus_test_online_golden_hour) is null, 0, max(bsi.bonus_test_online_golden_hour))
  - if(max(bsi.open_webcam_below_standard_penalty) is null, 0, max(bsi.open_webcam_below_standard_penalty))
  - if(max(bsi.full_face_below_standard_penalty) is null, 0, max(bsi.full_face_below_standard_penalty))
  - if(max(bsi.etiquette_violation_penalty) is null, 0, max(bsi.etiquette_violation_penalty))
  - if(max(t1.rating_below_standard_penalty) is null, 0,max(t1.rating_below_standard_penalty)) 
  - if(max(t1.cancel_penalty_income) is null, 0, max(t1.cancel_penalty_income))  as total_income,

  countif(t1.booking_status = 'Completed') as booking_completed
  
  
from (
SELECT 
  bs.id as booking_id,
  bs.begin_at as booking_time,
  
  -- case
  --     when bs.is_compensatory_course = 1 then 'buoi_bu'
  --     else 'buoi_chinh_thuc'
  -- end as booking_type,

  -- (select max(p.`name`) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = bs.teacher_id) as teacher_name,
  case
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 1 then 'Philippines'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 2 then 'Native'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 3 then 'Vietnamese'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 4 then 'Thailand'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 5 then 'Indonesia'
  when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 8 then 'Laos'
  when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 9 then 'Malaysia'
  end as teacher_country,
  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_status`(bs.status_id, bs.cancel_config_id) as booking_status,
  -- (select bp.number_of_shift from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.id = bs.program_id ) as num_shift,
  
  (`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_program_name_from_id`(bs.program_id)) as program,
  -- bs.teacher_id,

  -- case
  --   when (select min(cast(bo.payment_content as INT64)) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo
  --   where  bo.student_payment_id = bss.student_payment_id) = 1 then 'Buổi Học thử'
  --   when (select bph.payment_fee from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_payment_history` bph 
  --   where bph.id = bss.student_payment_id) = 0  then 'Buổi tặng'
  --   else 'Buổi Ghi danh'
  -- end as payment_content,
  
  -- (select bt.teacher_source from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bs.teacher_id = bt.user_id) as teacher_source,
  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_student_country`((select bst.country_id from  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst 
  where bs.id = bss.booking_session_id and bss.student_id = bst.user_id)) as student_country,
  bss.revenue,
  bss.currency_exchange_rate,
  bs.income,
 (bs.bonus_income + (select max(bse.bonus_excess) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_extend_bonus` bse 
  where bse.booking_id = bs.id)) as bonus_income,
  bs.rating_below_standard_penalty,
  bs.cancel_penalty_income,
  
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs
inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on bs.id = bss.booking_session_id 
--where bs.program_id not in (5,14,15,21,22,46,52,61,62,63,64,65,66,67,88,102)
where bs.program_id not in (select id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` where type in (2,3,4) or program_type = 1)
      and bs.status_id = 5
) t1
inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on t1.booking_id = bss.booking_session_id

left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_income` bsi on t1.booking_id = bsi.booking_session_id

join

(select t3.date, t3.sellingEx, t3.teacherCountry,
  lead (t3.date) over (partition by t3.teacherCountry order by t3.date) as next_applied_date
  from kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_teacher_income_ex t3) s2

on date(t1.booking_time) >= s2.date and (date(t1.booking_time) < s2.next_applied_date or s2.next_applied_date is null) and t1.teacher_country = s2.teacherCountry

--group by booking_id, booking_time, booking_type, teacher_name, teacher_country, booking_status, program, num_shift, teacher_id, payment_content, teacher_source, student_country

where t1.program like '%Test%'
group by booking_id, booking_time, teacher_country, booking_status, program, student_country
),

temp_table_1 as 
(
select 
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', tbc.booking_time) AS year_month,
    --  tbc.student_country,
      ROUND(SUM(tbc.total_income * tbc.sellingEx)) as tester_booking_cost,
      SUM(coalesce(tbc.booking_completed,0)) as num_booking_completed,
      case when SUM(coalesce(tbc.booking_completed,0)) = 0 then null 
           else 
                ROUND(SUM(tbc.total_income * tbc.sellingEx)/SUM(coalesce(tbc.booking_completed,0))) 
        end as cost_per_booking,

      -- SUM(case
      --         when tbc.total_income = 0 or tbc.total_income is null then 0
      --         else 1
      --     end
      -- ) as num_teacher_cost_booking,
      -- SUM(tbc.total_income * tbc.sellingEx) /   SUM(case
      --         when tbc.total_income = 0 or tbc.total_income is null then 0
      --         else 1
      --     end
      -- ) as cost_per_teacher_cost_booking

from tester_booking_cost_data tbc 
where date(tbc.booking_time) >= '2024-01-01'
group by year_month--, tbc.student_country
order by year_month desc
),

temp_table_2 as
(
select 
      tt.*,
      -- ctv_cost.ctv_cost as ctv_month_cost,
      toa.test_other_adjustment
from temp_table_1 tt
-- left join `kynaforkids-server-production.nhan_kynaforkids.ceo_cac_ctv_PT_cost` ctv_cost on tt.year_month = ctv_cost.year_month
left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_tester_other_adjustment` toa on tt.year_month = toa.year_month
),

temp_table_3 as
(
select 
      *,
      --28920833 as avg_month_ctv_pt_2024,
      --4365 as avg_booking_adjustment_2024,
      -- IF(year_month >= '2025-01',ROUND(28920833 * CAST(EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE()) AS BIGNUMERIC) / EXTRACT(DAY FROM LAST_DAY(CURRENT_DATE()))),null) AS projected_ctv_month_cost,
      IF(year_month >= '2025-01',ROUND(4365 * tt.num_booking_completed),null) as projected_month_adjustment,

from temp_table_2 tt 
order by year_month desc
)

select 
        *,
        -- if(ctv_month_cost is null, projected_ctv_month_cost, ctv_month_cost) as calc_ctv_month_cost,
        if(test_other_adjustment is null, projected_month_adjustment, test_other_adjustment) as calc_month_adjustment, 
        -- if(ctv_month_cost is null, projected_ctv_month_cost, ctv_month_cost) +
        if(test_other_adjustment is null, projected_month_adjustment, test_other_adjustment) + tester_booking_cost as total_test_cost  
        -- bao gồm booking theo ca đã hoàn thành, dự báo chi phí ctv theo ngày hiện  tại và dự báo chi phí adjust theo số booking đã hoàn thành
from temp_table_3 tt
where year_month <= FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', current_date())
;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_tester_other_adjustment`
(
  year_month STRING,
  year INT64,
  month INT64,
  test_other_adjustment INT64,
  Note STRING
);

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cac_trial_booking_cost_view`
AS with
trial_bookings as (
select 
  t1.booking_id,
  -- t1.revenue,
  t1.booking_time,
  -- t1.booking_type,
  -- t1.teacher_country,
  -- t1.teacher_source,
  -- t1.student_code,
  -- t1.booking_status,
  t1.teacher_income,
  -- t1.teacher_income_vnd,
(select tex.sellingEx from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_teacher_income_ex` tex where tex.teacherCountry = t1.teacher_country and DATETIME_TRUNC(tex.date,MONTH) = DATETIME_TRUNC(date(t1.booking_time),MONTH)) as teacher_income_ex,
  -- t1.program,
  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(t1.student_country_id) as student_country,
  t1.total_income,
  t1.payment_content,
from (
SELECT 
  bs.id as booking_id,
  bs.begin_at as booking_time,
  -- case
  --       when bs.is_compensatory_course = 1 then 'buoi_bu'
  --       else 'buoi_chinh_thuc'
  -- end as booking_type,
  case
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 1 then 'Philippines'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 2 then 'Native'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 3 then 'Vietnamese'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 4 then 'Thailand'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 5 then 'Indonesia'
  	when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 8 then 'Laos'
  	when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 9 then 'Malaysia'
  end as teacher_country,
   (select bt.teacher_source from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bs.teacher_id = bt.user_id) as teacher_source,
  -- (select booking_student.student_code from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` booking_student
  --  where bs.id = bss.booking_session_id and booking_student.user_id = bss.student_id) as student_code,
  -- case 
  --     when status_id = 1 then 'Draft'
  --     when status_id = 2 then 'New'
  --     when status_id = 3 then 'WaitingApprove'
  --     when status_id = 4 then 'Approved'
  --     when status_id = 5 then 'Completed'
  --     when status_id = 6 then 'Rejected'
  --     when status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id = 1 then 'Cancelled_by_teacher'
  --     when status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id = 2 then 'Cancelled_by_student_without_compensate'
  --     when status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id = 3 then 'Cancelled_by_kyna'
  --     when status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id = 4 then 'Cancelled_by_student_has_compensate'
  --     when status_id = 8 then 'Deleted'
  -- end as booking_status,
  bs.total_income as teacher_income,
  -- case
  --     when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 3 then bs.total_income
  --     when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 4 then ceiling(bs.total_income * 694.76)
  --     when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 5 then ceiling(bs.total_income * 1.61)
  -- else ceiling(bs.total_income * 23500) 
  -- end as teacher_income_vnd,
--   (select pro.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` pro where bs.program_id = pro.id) as program,
  (select bst.country_id from  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bs.id = bss.booking_session_id and bss.student_id = bst.user_id) as student_country_id,
  bs.total_income,
  -- bss.revenue,
   case
    when (select min(cast(bo.payment_content as INT64)) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo
    where  bo.student_payment_id = bss.student_payment_id) = 1 then 'Buổi Học thử'
    when (select bph.payment_fee from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_payment_history` bph 
    where bph.id = bss.student_payment_id) = 0  then 'Buổi Ops tặng'
    else 'Buổi Ghi danh'
  end as payment_content,

FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs
inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on bs.id = bss.booking_session_id 
where bs.program_id not in (select id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program`where  type in (2,3)) and status_id in (5,7)) t1
inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on t1.booking_id = bss.booking_session_id

where payment_content = 'Buổi Học thử'
      and DATE(t1.booking_time) >= '2024-01-01'
),

table_1 as 
(
select
    date(booking_time) as ngay_hoc,
    -- student_country,
    -- 'Tutoring' as product,
    ROUND(sum(teacher_income * teacher_income_ex)) as teacher_cost_hoc_thu,

from trial_bookings
group by ngay_hoc -- student_country
),

trial_cost_temp as
(
select
      FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', t1.ngay_hoc) as year_month,
      sum(t1.teacher_cost_hoc_thu) as teacher_cost_hoc_thu,
      min(if(t1.teacher_cost_hoc_thu is not null, 1, 0)) as is_cost_finalized,      

from table_1 t1 
group by year_month      
),

TrialCostData AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY year_month DESC) AS RowNum
    FROM
        trial_cost_temp
    WHERE trial_cost_temp.is_cost_finalized = 1
),

MostRecentKnownCost AS (
    SELECT
        teacher_cost_hoc_thu
    FROM
        TrialCostData
    WHERE
        RowNum = 1 AND is_cost_finalized = 1
),

ProjectedCost AS (
    SELECT
        *,
        CASE
            WHEN is_cost_finalized = 1 THEN teacher_cost_hoc_thu
            WHEN is_cost_finalized = 0 THEN ROUND((SELECT max(teacher_cost_hoc_thu) FROM MostRecentKnownCost) * 
                 IF(year_month <  FORMAT_DATE('%Y-%m', CURRENT_DATE()),1,(EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE()) / EXTRACT(DAY FROM LAST_DAY(CURRENT_DATE())))))
        END AS teacher_cost_projected
    FROM
        trial_cost_temp
)

select pc.year_month,
       pc.teacher_cost_projected as teacher_cost_hoc_thu
from ProjectedCost pc
order by year_month desc
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ceo_cfo_tasks_ops_students_relationship_view`
AS with task_control_data AS 
(
select 
  t1.id as task_id, 
  t1.subject,
  t1.start_date,
  case 
    when t1.status_id = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
    when t1.status_id = 2 then 'Đang xử lý'
    when t1.status_id = 3 then 'Đã xử lý'
    when t1.status_id = 4 then 'Trùng'
    else 'Từ chối'
  end as status,
  t1.assigned_to_id,
 (select max(rr.name) from `kynaforkids-server-production.redmine_kyna_task_live.members` rm, `kynaforkids-server-production.redmine_kyna_task_live.member_roles` rmr,
  `kynaforkids-server-production.redmine_kyna_task_live.roles` rr
  where rm.user_id = t1.assigned_to_id and rmr.member_id = rm.id and rmr.role_id = rr.id) as role_name, 
  (select lower(t2.value) from `kynaforkids-server-production.redmine_kyna_task_live.custom_values` t2 where custom_field_id = 1 and t2.customized_id = t1.id) as student_code_from_db,
from `kynaforkids-server-production.redmine_kyna_task_live.issues` t1
),

task_control_month AS 
(
select 
      format_datetime('%Y-%m', start_date) as month,
      -- EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) as month,
      -- CASE
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 4 THEN 'Apr 2024'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 5 THEN 'May 2024'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 6 THEN 'June 2024'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 7 THEN 'July 2024'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 8 THEN 'August 2024'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 9 THEN 'Sep 2024'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 10 THEN 'Oct 2024'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 11 THEN 'Nov 2024'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 12 THEN 'Dec 2024'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 1 THEN 'Jan 2025'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 2 THEN 'Feb 2025'
      --       WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_date) = 3 THEN 'Mar 2025'
      -- END AS month_name,
      COUNT(distinct task_id) as num_tasks,
      COUNT(distinct assigned_to_id) as num_ops_staffs,
      COUNT(distinct student_code_from_db) as num_students_with_tasks,
from task_control_data
where role_name like "%Ops%" 
group by month
-- having month > 3
order by month
),

student_info AS 
(select 
  t1.booking_id,
  t1.booking_time,
  t1.student_code,
  t1.booking_status,
from (
SELECT 
  bs.id as booking_id,
  bs.begin_at as booking_time,
  (select booking_student.student_code from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` booking_student
   where bs.id = bss.booking_session_id and booking_student.user_id = bss.student_id) as student_code,
  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_status`(bs.status_id, bs.cancel_config_id) as booking_status,
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs
inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on bs.id = bss.booking_session_id 
where bs.program_id in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.id != 3 and type != 4)  
) t1
where date(t1.booking_time) >= '2024-10-01' and (t1.booking_time) <= '2025-12-31'
and t1.booking_status = 'Completed' and t1.student_code like "K%"
),

active_students_month AS (
select  
        format_datetime('%Y-%m', booking_time) as month,
      
        -- EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) as month,
        -- CASE
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 4 THEN 'Apr 2024'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 5 THEN 'May 2024'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 6 THEN 'Jun 2024'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 7 THEN 'Jul 2024'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 8 THEN 'Aug 2024'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 9 THEN 'Sep 2024'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 10 THEN 'Oct 2024'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 11 THEN 'Nov 2024'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 12 THEN 'Dec 2024'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 1 THEN 'Jan 2025'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 2 THEN 'Feb 2025'
        --     WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM booking_time) = 3 THEN 'Mar 2025'

        -- END AS month_name,
        count(distinct student_code) as num_active_students,
from student_info 
group by month
order by month
)

select tc.*, ast.num_active_students,
from task_control_month tc
inner join active_students_month ast using(month)
order by month
;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.commission_config`
(
  id INT64,
  name STRING,
  affiliate_group_id INT64,
  affiliate_is_teacher INT64,
  teacher_commission_percent FLOAT64,
  affiliate_commission_percent FLOAT64,
  start_date INT64,
  end_date INT64,
  country_id INT64,
  status INT64,
  created_at INT64,
  updated_at INT64,
  created_by INT64,
  updated_by INT64,
  datastream_metadata STRUCT<uuid STRING, source_timestamp INT64>,
  PRIMARY KEY (id) NOT ENFORCED
)
CLUSTER BY id;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.commission_income`
(
  id INT64,
  order_id INT64,
  package_subscription_id INT64,
  affiliate_id INT64,
  affiliate_commission_percent FLOAT64,
  affiliate_commission_amount FLOAT64,
  affiliate_manager_id INT64,
  affiliate_manager_percent FLOAT64,
  affiliate_manager_amount FLOAT64,
  teacher_id INT64,
  teacher_commission_percent FLOAT64,
  teacher_commission_amount FLOAT64,
  total_amount FLOAT64,
  kyna_amount FLOAT64,
  acp_for_teacher FLOAT64,
  order_status INT64,
  created_at INT64,
  updated_at INT64,
  created_by INT64,
  updated_by INT64,
  package_id INT64,
  completed_at INT64,
  country_id INT64,
  currency_exchange_rate FLOAT64,
  manager_currency_exchange_rate FLOAT64,
  datastream_metadata STRUCT<uuid STRING, source_timestamp INT64>,
  PRIMARY KEY (id) NOT ENFORCED
)
CLUSTER BY id;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.commission_income_affiliate_video`
AS SELECT 
 t1.affiliate_id
  , (select max(u.email) 
  from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au
  where au.user_id = u.id and au.affiliate_id = t1.affiliate_id
  ) as affiliate_email
  , (
    select max(u.phone_number) 
    from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
    where au.user_id = u.id and au.affiliate_id = t1.affiliate_id 
    ) as phone_number
  , (
    select max(p.name) 
    from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
    where au.user_id = p.user_id and au.affiliate_id = t1.affiliate_id
    ) as name
  , (
    select ac.name 
    from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  
    where t1.affiliate_id = au.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id
    ) as loai_affiliate
  , `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source_affiliate`((
    select au.source_id 
    from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  
    where t1.affiliate_id = au.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id
    )) as Nguon
  , (
    select max(u.email)
    from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au
    where u.id = au.bd_incharge_id and t1.affiliate_id = au.affiliate_id ) as bd_incharge
  , (
    select 
      ( 
      case 
            when max(ac.status) is null then 'Chưa tạo hợp đồng'
            when max(ac.status) = 1 then 'Đã duyệt'
            when max(ac.status) = 0 then 'Đang chờ duyệt'
            when max(ac.status) = 2 then 'Đã hủy'
      else null
    end  ) as trang_thai_hop_dong
    from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_contract` ac 
    where ac.affiliate_id = t1.affiliate_id) as trang_thai_hop_dong
  , (
    select ac.bank_export_name 
    from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_contract` ac 
    where ac.affiliate_id = t1.affiliate_id) as ngan_hang
  ,   t1.ngay_thu_nhap_video as thang
  , SUM(t1.total_order) as total_order
  , 0 as tong_don_ghi_danh_lan_dau
  , 0 as phan_tram_lan_dau
  , 0 as hoa_hong_lan_dau
  , 0 as phan_tram_lan_dau_bonus
  , 0 as hoa_hong_lan_dau_bonus
  , 0 as tong_gon_ghi_danh_lai
  , 0 as hoa_hong_ghi_danh_lai
  , 0 as tong_hoa_hong_cuoi
  , 0 as total_amount
   -- ngalltt start 22/01/2025
  , 1 as co_phat_sinh_thu_nhap
  -- ngalltt end 22/01/2025
  , 0 as thuong_thang
  , 0 as du_no_ki_truoc
  , 0 as dieu_chinh_khac
  , 0 as dieu_chinh_thanh_toan
  , 0 as tong_tien_lan_dau_tutoring
  , 0 as tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_tutoring
  , 0 as tong_thu_nhap_tutoring
  , 0 as tong_don_tutoring
  , 0 as tong_tien_lan_dau_grai
  , 0 as tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai_grai
  , 0 as tong_thu_nhap_grai
  , 0 as tong_don_grai
  , 0 as tong_tien_lan_dau
  , 0 as tong_tien_ghi_danh_lai
  , 0 as tong_thu_nhap 
  , SUM(doanh_thu_video) as doanh_thu_video
  , SUM(hoa_hong_video) as hoa_hong_video
FROM
(
SELECT 
 FORMAT_DATETIME('%Y-%m', timestamp_seconds(o.created_at)) AS ngay_thu_nhap_video
 , (select au.affiliate_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.user_id = o.affiliate_id ) as affiliate_id 
 , ( o.total * o.currency_exchange_rate) as doanh_thu_video
 , ci.affiliate_commission_amount as hoa_hong_video
 , o.id as order_id
 , ci.total_order
FROM
  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` o
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT 
    order_id
    , SUM(affiliate_commission_amount * currency_exchange_rate) as affiliate_commission_amount
    , MAX(order_status) as order_status
    , COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) as total_order
  FROM  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.commission_income` GROUP BY order_id ) ci ON ci.order_id = o.id
WHERE
ci.order_status = 3
-- AND (ci.affiliate_commission_amount > 0)
-- AND o.affiliate_id = 52687
) t1
WHERE t1.affiliate_id is not null
GROUP BY t1.ngay_thu_nhap_video, t1.affiliate_id

;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.commission_income_bd_video_view`
AS SELECT 
  timestamp_seconds(o.completed_at) AS ngay_hach_toan
, o.invoice_code
, ci.currency_exchange_rate
, o.total
, ROUND(ci.total_amount + o.payment_fee) as total_amount
, ROUND(ci.total_amount + o.payment_fee) * ci.currency_exchange_rate as total_amount_vnd
, (
CASE 
WHEN (o.sub_total != 0) then ((o.sub_total + (o.sub_total * o.shipping_fee) - (o.discount_amount + o.voucher_discount_amount)) * o.currency_exchange_rate)
WHEN (o.sub_total=0) then 0
END
)  AS price_vnd
,'Đơn AI video' AS loai_don
, (
CASE 
  WHEN ori.user_type_id  = 1 THEN 'Trẻ em'
  WHEN ori.user_type_id  = 2 THEN 'Người lớn'
END
) AS loai_hoc_vien
, 'Học viên mới' AS student_type
, 'Ghi danh lần đầu' as payment_content
, 3 as payment_content_id
, (select au.affiliate_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.user_id = o.affiliate_id ) as affiliate_id 
, ( SELECT au.country_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
  WHERE au.user_id = o.affiliate_id ) AS country_id
,(SELECT MAX(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
WHERE au.user_id = u.id AND au.user_id = o.affiliate_id) as affiliate_email
, (SELECT ac.name FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
WHERE  au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id AND au.user_id = o.affiliate_id) as loai_affiliate

, (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  
WHERE au.user_id = o.affiliate_id ) AS affiliate_category_id

, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_source_affiliate`((SELECT au.source_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
WHERE au.user_id = o.affiliate_id)) as nguon_affiliate

, (SELECT au.source_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au 
WHERE au.user_id = o.affiliate_id) AS source_id

,(SELECT MAX(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.bd_incharge_id = u.id and au.user_id = o.affiliate_id) as bd_incharge

, 'Lần đầu' as lan_thanh_toan,

case
    when order_status = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
    when order_status = 2 then 'Xác nhận'
    when order_status = 3 then 'Hoàn thành'
    when order_status = 4 then 'Hủy'
    when order_status = 10 then 'Quy đổi hoa hồng'
    else 'Khác'
end as aff_commission_status

, ci.affiliate_commission_percent as affiliate_commission_percent_bonus
, ci.affiliate_commission_amount * ci.currency_exchange_rate AS hoa_hong_vnd
FROM
(
SELECT 
    order_id
    , MAX(affiliate_commission_percent) as affiliate_commission_percent
    , MAX(currency_exchange_rate) as currency_exchange_rate
    , SUM(affiliate_commission_amount) as affiliate_commission_amount
    , SUM(total_amount) as total_amount
    , MAX(order_status) as order_status
    , COUNT(DISTINCT order_id) as total_order
  FROM  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.commission_income` GROUP BY order_id ) ci
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` o ON ci.order_id = o.id
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori on o.id = ori.order_id
WHERE
ci.order_status in (3,10)
AND o.id IN (
	SELECT 
		od.order_id
	FROM
		`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` od
	INNER JOIN
		`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` p ON p.id = od.package_id
	INNER JOIN
		`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_category` pc ON pc.id = p.category_id
	WHERE
		(`pc`.`id` = 41)
)
-- AND (ci.affiliate_commission_amount > 0)
-- AND ci.order_id = 688897
-- AND ci.currency_exchange_rate != 1
ORDER BY o.id DESC


;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ltv_order_1_1`
AS select 
t1.user_id,
t1.email,
(select max(u.phone_number) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = t1.user_id) as phone_number,
(select max(p.name) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = t1.user_id) as `name`,
t1.first_time_purchase,
t1.number_of_perchase,
t1.total_value_purchased,
t1.max_purchased,
t1.min_purchased,
'Kynaforkids 1-1' as System,
concat(substr((select max(u.phone_number) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = t1.user_id), 1, 6), '******') as Encrypt_phone_number
from
(
Select 
		(select max(u.id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.email = bo.email) as user_id,
    max(bo.email) as email,
		min(bo.created_at) as first_time_purchase,
    count(distinct(bo.id)) as number_of_perchase,
		sum(bo.total) - sum(if(bo.discount_money is null, 0, bo.discount_money)) as total_value_purchased,
    min(bo.total - if(bo.discount_money is null, 0, bo.discount_money)) as min_purchased,
    max(bo.total - if(bo.discount_money is null, 0, bo.discount_money)) as max_purchased
	from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo
	where bo.payment_status = 1 and bo.total != 0
	group by bo.email
  order by bo.email ) as t1;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.ltv_report_view`
AS WITH main_table AS (

      SELECT 
      t1.student_name AS student_name
      , if(t1.student_code is null, t1.phone_number, t1.student_code) as student_code
      , t1.order_code
      , (t1.tong_thu) AS tong_thu
      , DATETIME_TRUNC(timestamp_seconds(t1.don_ghi_danh_lan_dau),MONTH) AS don_ghi_danh_lan_dau
      , DATETIME_TRUNC(timestamp_seconds(t1.accounting_date), MONTH) as accounting_date
      , datetime_diff(DATETIME_TRUNC(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d',@DS_END_DATE),MONTH),DATETIME_TRUNC(DATE(timestamp_seconds(t1.don_ghi_danh_lan_dau)),MONTH),MONTH) as max_no_month_ranges
      , datetime_diff(DATETIME_TRUNC(DATE(timestamp_seconds(t1.accounting_date)),MONTH),DATETIME_TRUNC(DATE(timestamp_seconds(t1.don_ghi_danh_lan_dau)),MONTH),MONTH) as retention_months
      , datetime_diff(DATETIME_TRUNC(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d',@DS_END_DATE),MONTH),DATETIME_TRUNC(PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d',@DS_START_DATE),MONTH),MONTH) as max_cohort_ranges
      , t1.country
      , t1.user_type

      FROM
      (
        SELECT
        bo.student_code_1 AS student_code
        , (SELECT MAX(p.`name`) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p ,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst WHERE bst.student_code = bo.student_code_1 AND p.user_id = bst.user_id
        ) AS student_name
        , (bo.phone_number) AS phone_number
        , (bo.Order_Code) as order_code
        , (bo.Original_Price * bo.Ex)  AS tong_thu
        --, (SELECT MIN(bos.Date) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_Order_Tutoring_No_Students`  bos
        --WHERE bos.student_code_1 = bo.student_code_1 AND bos.Payment_Content not in ('Đơn hoàn tiền','Hoàn tiền','Học thử') and bos.student_code_1 is not null -- and bos.total_lesson >= 10
        --group by bos.student_code_1
        -- ) AS don_ghi_danh_lan_dau
        -- Diep adding start 15-03-2025
        , (SELECT MIN(bos.accounting_date) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_Order_Tutoring_No_Students`  bos
          WHERE bos.student_code_1 = bo.student_code_1 AND bos.Payment_Content not in ('Đơn hoàn tiền','Hoàn tiền','Học thử') and bos.student_code_1 is not null -- and bos.total_lesson >= 10
          group by bos.student_code_1
        ) AS don_ghi_danh_lan_dau
        ,bo.accounting_date as accounting_date
        -- Diep adding end 15-03-2025
        --, bo.Date as accounting_date
        , (bo.Market)  AS country
        , (CASE (bo.user_type_id)
          WHEN 1 THEN 'Kid'
          WHEN 2 THEN 'Adult'
          END ) AS user_type
        FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_Order_Tutoring_No_Students`  bo
        WHERE bo.Payment_Content not in ('Đơn hoàn tiền','Hoàn tiền','Học thử') -- and bo.total_lesson >= 10
        AND bo.student_code_1 is not null and (DATE(bo.Date)  >= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_START_DATE)
          AND DATE(bo.Date) <= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_END_DATE))

        UNION ALL

        SELECT 
        NULL AS student_code
        , (bo.name) as student_name
        , (bo.phone_number) as phone_number
        , (bo.Order_Code) as order_code
        , (bo.Original_Price * bo.Ex)  AS tong_thu
        --, (SELECT MIN(bos.Date) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_Order_Tutoring_No_Students`  bos
         -- WHERE bos.phone_number = bo.phone_number AND bos.Payment_Content not in ('Đơn hoàn tiền','Hoàn tiền','Học thử') and bos.student_code_1 is null -- and bos.total_lesson >= 10
         -- group by bos.phone_number
        --) AS don_ghi_danh_lan_dau
        
        -- diep start 15-03-2025
        , (SELECT MIN(bos.accounting_date) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_Order_Tutoring_No_Students`  bos
          WHERE bos.phone_number = bo.phone_number AND bos.Payment_Content not in ('Đơn hoàn tiền','Hoàn tiền','Học thử') and bos.student_code_1 is null -- and bos.total_lesson >= 10
          group by bos.phone_number
        ) AS don_ghi_danh_lan_dau
        , bo.accounting_date
        -- diep end 15-03-2025
        
        --, bo.Date
        , (bo.Market)  AS country
        , ( CASE (bo.user_type_id)
          WHEN 1 THEN 'Kid'
          WHEN 2 THEN 'Adult'
          END ) AS user_type

        FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_Order_Tutoring_No_Students` bo
        WHERE bo.Payment_Content not in ('Đơn hoàn tiền','Hoàn tiền','Học thử') -- and bo.total_lesson >= 10
        AND bo.student_code_1 is null and (DATE(bo.Date) >= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_START_DATE)
          AND DATE(bo.Date) <= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d',@DS_END_DATE))
      ) t1
   
   WHERE 
    (
      DATE(timestamp_seconds(t1.don_ghi_danh_lan_dau)) >= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d', @DS_START_DATE) 
      AND (DATE(timestamp_seconds(t1.don_ghi_danh_lan_dau)) <= PARSE_DATE('%Y%m%d',@DS_END_DATE))
    )
 )

SELECT  ma.student_code
       ,ma.student_name
       ,ma.order_code
       ,sum(ma.tong_thu) as tong_thu
       ,ma.don_ghi_danh_lan_dau
       ,ma.accounting_date
       ,ma.max_no_month_ranges
       ,ma.retention_months
       ,ma.max_cohort_ranges
       ,max(ma.country) as country
       ,max(ma.user_type) as user_type
 FROM main_table ma
 GROUP BY ma.don_ghi_danh_lan_dau, ma.accounting_date, ma.student_code, ma.student_name, ma.order_code ,ma.max_no_month_ranges ,ma.retention_months ,ma.max_cohort_ranges
;
